item.text: bya@#// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrug brgyapa/ bam po nyis
ba gya gsum pa/// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad duzhen/ chos kyi dbyi=
lani rnam par rtog pa de dgamamachis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags/ gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyis ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi
gyis so// chos kyi dbus nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings na lags/ tshor ba las
gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chol
ba'o// 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyingasam mchis
te/ 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyang chos kyi byis ma lag/
'du byed los gud na'ang chos kyi dbus ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du
byed do// rnam par shes pa'i ng chos kyi dbyis ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gang na'ang chos kyi dbyis ma mchis te/
rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbus nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig kyang chos kyi dbyis ma
lags/ mig las gang na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis to/ mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang yig go/ rna ba'ang chos kyi dbus ma lags/ rna ba las gudana'ang chos kyi dbus ma mchis te/ rnapa nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi byings nyid kyang rnapo'o// sna'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te/ sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang sna'o// lce'ang chos kyi bsam legs/ lce las gudana'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyang chos kyi dbanges ma lags/
lus las gdan 'ang chos kyi dbyanges ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbus nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyis ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang yod do// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ gzugs las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings mamachis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang/
gzugs so// sgra 'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sgra las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings mamachis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingasaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'ang chos kyi dbying
ma lags/ dri las gung ma'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ drod kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ srolas gung na'ang chos kyi
dbyings na mchis te/ ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbus nyid kyang ro'o// reg kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ reg las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchisate/ reg nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/ chos kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ chos las gud na'ang chos kyi dbas ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingasaso// chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ng chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mag ga rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings ting kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ng chos kyi dbangs ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gudana'ang chos kyi
na@#// byings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyas so// chos kyi dbyings nyin kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna rnam pa rang shes pa'i ng chos kyi
byanges ma lags/ sna'i rnam pa shes pa las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i rnam par
shos pa'o// lce'i rnam par shis pa'i ng chos kyi dbyingasam lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam bar shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so//
chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng chos kyi dbus ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyanges mAmachis te/
lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingasaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par
shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbanges ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg
ba'ang chos kyi dbyanges ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyidi kyang mag
gi 'dus te reg pa 'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ng chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba' 'dus te reg pa las gung na'ang chos kyi dbus ma mchis te/ rna ba' 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyingasaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba' 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyingan mchis te/
sna'i 'dus te reg nga nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'o/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ng chos kyi dbus ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyanges ma mas te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ng chos kyi
dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyanges ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg ba nyid kyang chos kyi desaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ng chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'ded kyang chos kyi dbyinges so// chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbunges ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
mamachis te/ mag gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dpyangs so// chos kyi debyangs nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rnab 'a
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis mor ba'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa brkyen gyis tshor ba las nyung na'ang chos kyi dbangs ma mchis te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor

ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna' 'dus te/
rig ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gung na'ang chos kyi dbangs ma mchis te/ snang 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingasu so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i 'dus te reg/
ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'a rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud nu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i n gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyangos ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so//
chos kyi dbyings de kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyangs mu lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba las gudana'ang chos kyi dbangs ma mas te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba'o sa' khamasakyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ sa'i khams las gungana'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mas de/ sa' khams zhing kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings de kyang
sa khams so// chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nu' khams zhing kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyangs de
kyang chu khams so/ me'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma'i khams las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbanges
nyid kyang ma'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rlung gi khams 'phas gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kya
dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las//
gu da na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa 'a khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam bar shes pa'i khams so// ma ga nga 'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags/ ma rig pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/
'du byed las gud na'ang chos kyi dbangs ma mchis te/ 'du byad nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i ng chos kyi dbyings ma 'gas/ rnam
pa shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes da'o// ming dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings
ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skya mchod
drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// sgyu mar drug las gud marang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyanges nyid kyang skye mched drug
go reg pa'i ng chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ reg pa 'a sa gang na'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi ngabyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// srong nga 'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags// srid pa 'a sa gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings 'ded kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i ng chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ le na nga
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i ng chos kyidabyinges ma lags/ srid pa las gung nang
chos kyi dbyangs ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyinges nyid kyang srid pa'o// skya ba'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ skya ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te// skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ rma sha 'as gud na'ang chos kyi dbyinges ma mchis te/ rgan
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ng chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin palas gung na'ang chos kyi ngabanges
ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng
chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gung ma'ang chos kyi dbyings ra mchis te/ bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings zhing kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyangesaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga 'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gur

na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
ma lags/ nang stong pa de las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa 'ang ngo/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos

kyi dbyings ma 'gas/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbangs so// chos kyi dbyangs ched kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa

nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings Did kyang bya nang stong pa
nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gung na'ang chos kyi dbus ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
chos kyi dbyings da kyang stong pa de stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa 'di kyang chos kyi dbyings ba lags/ chen po stong nga nyid nas gud na'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma mchis te/ chen po stong pa

nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// don dam pa stong ba 'di las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ don dam ba stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngonangam pastong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma 'a ga
'dus byas stong pa de las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gudana'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang 'dus/
mabyas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthul las pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa de kyang chos kyi dbanges ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong

pa nyid las gur na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbanges nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba mad pa stong

pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dor ba mad pa med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang dor

nga med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dpangs ma mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/
so chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbanges ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyas ma mchis te/

chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyidi

stong pa nyid las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gamtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi dmags pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mdamigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings 'di kyang mi
dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyang sam mas te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang

chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo di stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyanges ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyis las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te/ ngabo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo botade stong pa nyid do// dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi/
dbyings ma lags/ dngos po mad nga 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa de las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa 'i ngo bo de stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs
nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dranang te par gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dranapa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma mchis
ba te = dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par song ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyangos ma lags
yang dag par spong ba rnams las gudabang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yang dag par sbyong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par song ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyangs so/ chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyinges ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na 'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dbang po rnams kyang chos
kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyinges ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi debyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma 'gas// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbying
man chis to/ byang chub kyi yan lag da kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam las gud na'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo// 'phags pa 'a bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ 'bags pa'i bden ba
rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbanges so// chos kyi dbus nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan rnams
kyang chos kyi dbyinges ma 'a gas/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams
so tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyanges ma mchis te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyinges so// chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbusu ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las//
gudana'ang chos kyi dbyanges ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//
rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa ra shar nga rnams las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings go/ chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i so mas par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dpyanges ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gung na'ang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbanges so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams se// rnam
par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i ng chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma mang pa dang/ smon pa med pa
las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ son pa med pa 'o// mngon pa shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbying
ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingasaso// chos kyi dbus nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyingasu ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin
rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings
ma lugs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyinges ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gung na'ang chos
kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags//
so so yang dag par ga pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyingasad kyang
so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byams pa chen po 'a sa gud na'ang chos kyi dbyangs mamachis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chog
dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ snying rje chon pobang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snying rje chen
po nyid kyang chos kyi dpyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis to sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
so rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma 'dzugs/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun du zhugs ra ba 'bras bu nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings 'de kyang rgyun du zhugs nga 'i 'bras bu'o/[” ]/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lanacig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud
nu'ang chos kyi dbyings mamachis te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras/
du'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ dgu bcom pa de las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings mams te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
sakyi dbyangs nying kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sa gud na'ang chos kyi dbyangs ma
mas te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbus nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa de do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings ted kyang rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du sus pa de bzhin
no gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyidi kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs de kyang mig go/ rnab nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang rna ba'o/
sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings ltad kyang lce'o// lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs
nyid kyang lus so// ya de nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang yod do// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid kyang

chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang ro'o//

rig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa de kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bag ga rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa/
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings snyed kyang lce'i rnam par shes
pa'o lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'o// yid kyi rnam par shes ba med kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rnab 'i 'dus te reg pa 'ad kyang
chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te rag pa'o// lce'i
'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang lus
@#// kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig ga 'dus te reg pa'i skyon/

gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'di kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang sna' 'dus te reg
ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lceb 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ lus kyi 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang sa'i khams so//
cha galams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me 'khams so// rlung gi khams/
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings 'ad kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par
shes pa'i khams de kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma ga pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa 'o//

'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa 'o// mang dang gzugs/

nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mang dang gzugs so// skye mched drug khrid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sku mched drug go reg pa nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs 'di kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbus nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbanges so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang srid pa'o// len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len ba'o// srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbus so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skya ba nyid kyang

chos kyi dbyings so/ 'chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
kag la// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dpyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

na ba'o// bzodapa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/

chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad kyang chos kyi dbyinges so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid

kyang nang stong pa nyid do// la stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang phyi stong pa 3da do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang phyin ng/

stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs

nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so//
@#/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa 'de chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa//

nyid chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang

bla ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyanges so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid

stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyanges nyid kyang rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma dmigs
ba stong ba nyid do/ das bo med ba stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyas so// chos

kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ngo stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid do// dran nga
te bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa la bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos

kyi dbyangs nyid kyang yang dag pa ra slong ba rnams so/// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi ngadungs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi
dbanges so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi
phyongs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'bags pa 'baden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbus nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden snams so// bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi/
dbyangs nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang tshad mad pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs mad pa'i goms par 'ad+d+hag pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams
so thar gyis gnasapa' snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo
stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon nga
mad pago/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon pa shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbangesaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhinagshegs ba'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingesaso//
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// ma 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyanges so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang ma 'jigs pa rnams so// so so ya nga dag nga 'a
ga pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa/
chen po'o// sAng rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sIng rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings 'di
kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs de kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingasaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi/
dbyings nyid kyang phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa'o// rang byang chub de kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi

zhwa dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingasas// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa dang do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de kyang chos
kyi dpangs so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
! phyin nga la stong pa 'tsho/ chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa ra yang ma 'gyur tu/ chos thams cad na
chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas/ sa thams
cang meng med pa la mang ga brdas chos ston te/ 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du shes zhes bya'o/ 'di na 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes/
bya'o 'di na mig ces bya'o// 'di'i rna ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sa zhes bya'o// 'di na lce zhes bya'o// 'dzin lus zhes bya'o// 'di ni pa da res bya'o// 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di/
ni sgra zhes bya'o// 'di ni dra zhes bya'o// 'di ni ro zhes bya'o// 'di na rig ces bya'o// 'di na chos zhes bya'o// 'di na mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
zhes bya'o// 'di nasna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di na lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'ad na lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di na yid kyi rnam pa ru shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di
na mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba' 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di na sna' 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus
te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yod kyi 'dus te rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di na rna ba'i 'dus te reg nga 'a rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/
'di ni sna' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di na rtse'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di na las kyi dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ro
ga/ yid kyi 'dus te leg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di na chu'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni ma'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di'i rlung gi
khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di na 'du byed ces bya'o// 'din rnam bar/
shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni skye mched drugaces bya'o// 'di ni rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni srid pa zhes bya'o// 'di na len
ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni srid pa zhes bya'o// 'di na skye ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rga shi zhes bya'o// 'din sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
bya'o 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'ad ni shes rab kyi ba

rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di na phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di na phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni stong pa 'di stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni/
chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rus bya'o// 'ad ni mtha'/
las 'das pa stong pa nyidas bya'o// 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di na der ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di narang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di/
ni chos thams cad stong ba nyid cas bya'o// 'di na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di na mdamigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dngos po me dang stong pa nyid ces
bya'o// 'di nangabo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o/ 'di dag ni yang
dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni dbang po rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag na stobs rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni bsam
gtan rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag na tshad med pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyud ces
bya'o// 'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes
[… ]@#// bya'o/ 'di dag ni mngon pa la shes pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni ba gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag/
sha/ na de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag na mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di ni byams pa chen
bo zhes bya'o// 'ad na sAng rje chen po zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'ang na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di na lan cig
phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya'o// 'od na ring byang chub ces bya'o// 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa/
shes pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste// dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po
'am/ sgyu ma byed pa'i machan bu mkhas pa zhig gas sakyi rnam ba gyin zhig la brten nas/ gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs som/ rta'i
gzugs saMm/ ba glang gi gzugs sam rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs sam/ spyod mos tshal dang//
bag zhal med khang dang/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang/ kun dga' r la mdangs dga' ba lam/ rje ngabu mdangs dga' ba 'am/ nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul cung 3
de dag tu stan dang/ 'khor gyi stan dang/ gzha rnam pa sna tshogs btanges te/ me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ kha zas dang/ spyan gzigs zhim po
dag bstan tam/ glu dang sal snyan gyis rgya bo dga' bar byas sam/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba 'am/ tshul khrims bsrung ba 'o// bzod pa bsgrub pa 'am/ brtson 'grus brtson
ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba 'am/ shes rab bsgom pa 'am/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bar byas te/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ bram
ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tame/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ ri rab bstan tam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
lha rnams bstan tam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstan tam dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bstanatum/ 'phrul dga' lha rnams bstan tam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstan
tam tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstanatam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ snang ba'i
lha rnams bstan tam/ chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstan ta// dag pa'i lha rnams bstan
tam chung dga'i lha rnams bstan ta ma/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ dra ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam ched
tshad che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam mi che ba'i lha rnams bstanatam/ ma gdung ba' lha rnams bstan tam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan tam
gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'og man gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skya mtshad kyi lha rnams
bstan tam/ cung zad med pa 'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ gzugs med pa rnams bstan tam/ rgyun du zhugs
ba dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ byang sa 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas mang po bstan tam byang chub sams dba' sems dang 'chen po sems dang bo bskyedaM pa nas

ba ra bzung ste// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

0 la spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi ba rol tu phyin pa la stod pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasod pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ phyi nang stong/

ba nyid la spyod pa dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ 'dus ma

byas stong pa 'di la sbyong pa dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ rang bzhin

stong ba nyid la spyod pa dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ dngos po mad pa steng pa//

nyid la spyod pa dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ dngos po med pa' ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams lo spyod pa dang/ yang dag par spro byung ba/
rnams la spyod pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang/ stobs rnams la spyod pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la stong pa rang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ soms par 'jug pa la spyod
pa dang sa dang bo yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa gsum pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa bzhi pa
lo ngas su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa brgyad pa/
yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa bcu pa yongs surdzogs par byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang/ mngon
ba sngashes ba mngon par sgrub pa dang/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang/ sbyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub
pa dang/ snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag bstan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs surdzogs par bstan na/ de la sems can byis
tshab 'a ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/ skyes ma 'dis legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i/ rims ba dag byed/ de ltar skya bo dga' bar byed cing/ gzugs kyi bye brag sna/
tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs dang/ rta'i gzugs dang/ ba glang gi gzugs dang/ rnamo dang lug gi gzugs dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzug
ston pa dang/ spyod mos tshal dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang/ kun dga' ra ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang/ rdzing bu mdangs ngaga' ba ston pa dang/ nags
tshal mdangs ngaga' ba ston pa dang/ de dag tu stan dang/ 'khor gyi stan dang/ gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs btang ste/ me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ sngos dang/ byug pa dang/ kha zas dang/
spyan gzigs mang bo de lta bur ston pa dang/ glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba dang/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang/ bzod pa bsgrub pa dang/
brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang/ ting nge 'dzan gyis rnam par rtse ba dang/ shes rab bsgom pa dang/ rnam pa 'di dag gas skye bo dga' bar byed cing/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rabs ston
pa dang/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rogs ston pa dang/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang/ ri rab ston pa dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ sum cu rtsa
gsum gyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ mtshama'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ 'phrul dga' lha rnams ston pa dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang/

khyed kyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ tshangs lha nya phan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ston
pa dang/ snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ chung snang gi lha rnams ston pa dang/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ dge ba'i lha rnams ston
pa dang/ chung dge'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ tshadamed dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ chung chu'i lha rnams ston pa dang/
tshad med che ba 'a lha rnams ston pa dang/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ mi che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ ma gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa
dang gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ nam mkha' mkha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
ston pa dang/ cung zad med pa 'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ 'du shes med 'ashes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang/ gzugs med pa rnams ston ba dang/ rgyun du zhugs
bka ba'i 'bras bu rnams ston pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnams dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas mang bo rnams ston cing/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ nang

stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ don dam pa/
stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa de la stod pa dang/ 'tha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la srong pa dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med

ba stong pa nyid la sbyong pa dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la stod pa dang/ ranga bzhi n stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

la spyod pa dang/ mi dmags pa stong pa nying la spyod pa dang/ dngos po mad pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ dngos po mad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
spyod pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ ya nga dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ dbang po
rnams la stod pa dang/ stobs rnams la stod pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa laspyod pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
la spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa gnyis pa
( yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa drug pa yongs
su rdzogs par byed ng dang/ sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sa bcu pa yongs su
rdzogs par bud pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang/ mngon pa rashes pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtsa ba dang/ 'jig rten
gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su
mthag tong ba dang/ dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams longs su sgrub pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rna
yongs su sgrub pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang 2 byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang/ snying rje chen po mngon nga ra sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing/
sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to// de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la/ yid
rno ba dang ldan pa// dpyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/ mi 'di de ltar mdupa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa na
ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/ sems can 'di ngag ni dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa 'o zhes bya bar de dag gshegs pa 'byungango// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsho/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs
su snyan par byed kyang/ sems can du ma dmigs/ sems can du gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yano/ sbyin
dpa' legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar sbyod pa yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims srub
ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun
pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bzod pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bzod nga 'i lags pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod
ba sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul ba yin/ brtson 'grus
kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan ga nga brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa
min gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par sprul ba yin/ ting nga 'dzin gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod
cing mthun pas dga' bar sbyongs yani/ bdag kyang shes rab sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ saMms can
mtsha gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi
lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dge ba bcu'alas kyi lam gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag nga ra 'dzin pa de dag ga ligs pa rjod cing
mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin
yan lag brgyad dang ldan nga'i gso sbyin gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga'
bar sbyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa 'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la mang dag par skul ba yin/ bslab pa 'i gnas lnga' legs pa rjod pa yin/
sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la ya nga ngag nga ra 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar sbyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/
sems can gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yan/ bsam gtan dang po'i ligs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la soms par 'jug pa
ka/ de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang/
dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gas pa' legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gangabasam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag ga legs pa rjod cing mthunapas dga'
bal sod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa lasnyoms par 'jug pa yan/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yan/ bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa/
rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la soms bar 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la
snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gatran bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi
t+taM/ pa la soms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun ra sa dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa la soms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag bar
skul ba yin/ byams pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag
ma kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang nang rje la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang gAng rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
grwa legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yar/ gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yani/ dga' pa' legs pa rjod pa
yin sems can gzhan gang dga' ba lasnyoms par 'jug pa de ngag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang btang snyoms la soms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan
ya nga btang snyoms la yang dag par sprul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs parjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms lasnyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs parjod cing na thun pas
dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas mched la soms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skya mchad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ nam mkha'/
mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag ga legs pa rjod cung mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la soms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi leg
ba rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag/
kyang nyung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i machod la yang dag par skul ba yin/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin
sa mas can gzhan gang nyung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun bas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med man skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min spyamachod kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems
can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar sbyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa
na gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dran pa 'bur gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar sbyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba
tsayin yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag
kyang la 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan
gangardzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar sbyong pa yin/ bdag kyang dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par/
skul ba yin/ dbang bo rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams sgom pa de dag ga legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang stobs
rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ stobs rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang stobs rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing
mthun pa sa dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa yan/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi
legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byung chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas ngaga' bar sbyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
ci ga/ brgyad pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa la yang dag par skul ba yan/ 'phags pa 'a lam yan lag brgyud pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/
sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi legs ba rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin/ gzhan
mang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi legs pa rdzong pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa de dag ga legs
tshu la rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar stong pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs pa
rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mah+phar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
sgom ba yin/ gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyam par 'jug pa ngagu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can
gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug ba dgu sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mngon
par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga' legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lta sgom pa de dag ga le gas pa rjod cing mthun pas dga'
bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la soms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug
ba'i logs pa chod pa yan/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun mas dga' bar sbyong pa yani/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa
yin gzhan ya nga gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag parngu skul ba pan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs
parjod cing mthun pas dga' bar srid pa yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bdu sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs b.ru sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
bdag kyang ma 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa yin gzhan yang ma 'jigs pa bzhal yang dag par skul ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang la 'jigs pa
dbazhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' par spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang sa so yang dag par rig
ba bzhi la yang dag par skal ba yan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun
bas dga' bar song pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po sgom pa yan gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa chen po'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can
gzhan gang byams pa chen po sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar sbyong pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom pa yin gzhan yang sang rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba
na snying rje chen po'alegs brjod pa yani/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje chen po sgom pa de dag ga legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar sbyod pa yin/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad kyi legs pa rjod pa yin
sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mchen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub
pa yin/ gzhan yang ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag pa'i skul ba yin/ ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ma chen po'i mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dag ga le gas brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dpe byad bzang bo brgyad chu sgrub ba yin/ gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad chu la yang dag par
sprul ba yin/ dang byad bzang po brgyad cu'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dpe byad bzang po brgyad nu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing ma thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin 3
rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings ston rilta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam/ bar du'ang de bzhin ma yin du zin nani/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston pa ma 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par ma 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi nang yongs su dag
bar byed par ma 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta par lus kyang de bzhan/ bar du'ang de bzhin bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po 'ang shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston to// sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sems can rnams
yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ shes rab kyi' rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam bo nyis brgya gya bzhi nga////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te sems can yang shan tu ngamigs su ma mchis la/ sems can du dmigs pa'i ng ma mchis na/ su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' mA
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor dang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/ sams
can gyi mtha' yang gzhan yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom par ma 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
sems can gyi mtha'ayang gzhan ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin ba la sgom pa 'a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma 'gas/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das
gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag ba'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur nani/ des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis
na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po4 shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' su/la pa/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med/ rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba'ang mad na 'on kyang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pa'i tshi/ thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'gong do// yang dag nga 'a mtha' rnam bar
'khrugs par ma byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gyi ma tha' yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar na sems can gyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i tshatha'
de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dwapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par ma bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// 'ab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tshe/ soms dang po bskyod pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems can
rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do// sbyin pa la rab tu bkod na/ sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang/ tha ma'i mtha' dang/ dbus ston te/ ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mthar yang stong/ tha
ma'i mtha' yang stong/ dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong sbyin bdag kyang stong/ len pa'i ng stong par ston cang/ rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag
mad kyis/ sbyin pa'i ng gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/ len pa'i ng gzhan no snyam du ma soms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod nam
sbyin pa'i ng gzhan la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no snyam du mi sams// sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/ len pa'i ng gzhan no sAm du masams pa de'i tsho/ khyod kyi sbyin pa 'ad bdud rtsi dang/
[bdud rtsa' 'bras bu dang/ mthar bdud rtsar 'gyur te/ spen pa 'dis gzugs yongs su ma 'byin cig/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin
go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'ang ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pas stong ngo// de'i 'bras bu'ang 'bras bus stong ngo/ sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gas stong ngo// len pa'i ng len pa sa stong ste/

stong ba nyid la ni sbyin pa mi dmigs/ sbyin pa 'a 'bras bu dang/ sbyin bdag dang/ len pa ma ngamags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong ngo zhes brjod do/
gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la 'god
da tshur rigs kyi bu srog gcod pa spos la/ srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ ma byin par len pa spongs la/ ma byin par len pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ 'dod pas
log par g.yem pa spongs la/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ brdzun du sba ba sbyos la// brdzun du smra ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ phra ma spongs la/
khri ma las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig spongs la/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ tshig bstsal pa spongs la/ ga bkyal pa las phyir ldog par
gyis shig/ chags sems songs la/ chags sems las phu'i ldog par gyis shig/ gnod sems spongs la/ gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shag
log par lta ba stongs la/ log par lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu chos 'ang dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyis/ rigs kyi bu soms
dang gang gi srog gcad par bya ba'i srogachags dang/ gang gis srog gcad par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang ma byin par blang ba dang/ ma byin par len par btags pa/
dang/ gang gis blang bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem par btags pa dang/ gang gis 'dod pas lag par
yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang bat+tan du sba ba dang/ brdzun du sba bar brtags pa dang/ gang gis brdzun du sba bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhag yin/ gang phram
!/ smra ba dang/ phra ma smra bar btags pa dang/ gang gis phra mar saM bar bye ba de lta bu'i tshos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang zhe gcod pa'i tshig sna ba dang/ zhe gcod par btags pa dang gang gis
zhe gcod pa'i tshig tu smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang tshig bkyal pa skya ba dang/ tshig bkyal par btags pa dang/ gang gis tshig bkyal par smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang
pas gang zhig yin/ gang chags sems bskyed pa dang/ chags sems su btags pa dang/ gang gis chags sems sbyang pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang gnod sams sbyang ba dang/
gnod sems su btags pa dang gang gis gnod sems su bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang log par lta ba dang/ log pa ra lta bar btags pa dang/ gang gis leg par
mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston cing/ tshul khrims la 'god de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa'i tsho sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// des de la sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang/ tshul khrims
kyi 'bras bu de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas/ rigs kyi bu dos sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong nga ra rig nas/ de la mngon par zhen par ma byed do// mngon
par zhen pa med pas/ 'khrugs par ma 'gyur zhing shes rab skyed do/ @#/ shes rab nges kyang bag la nyal ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba thums cad nas/ phung po ma lus nga 'i mya ngan las
'das pa'i dabyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das twaM kA de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
ku ba lam/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ de'amya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba na/ 'ad lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa/
stongapad do/ ra ba 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slong pa'i tsho sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing
'khrugs par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na 'ad skad du 'dems8shang ston te/ rigs kyi bu bzod pa sgrubs shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ des pa dang/ sems zhi ba dang/ dang du
sems pa 'a ngang tshul can du gyis shig/ gang gnod par byed pa dang/ gang gis gnod par bya ba dang/ gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhan gyis stong pa yin
gyis rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni su yod/ gnod par na su la bya/ rtsis ni gnod par bya soms dang/ chos de dag thams cad narang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong
ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nam yang ma stong par mi 'gyur te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so// rang sangs rgyas pa
rnams kyis ma byas so// nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so// lha rnams kyis ma byas so// klu rnams kyis ma byas so// gnod sbyin rnam sa kyis ma byas so// dra ze rnams kyis mabyas
so lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas so// nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so// ma'am tsa rnams kyis ma byas so// lta 'phachen go rnams kyis ma byas so// rgyal chen bzhi'i
ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so// sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ mtsham dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs pa dang/ dge rgyas dang/
gnas gtsang ma dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min mched kyi
lha rnams kyis ma byas te/ de na rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o// rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni su la'ang gnod par ma byed do zhes nas/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la sbyor tu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
bkod cing/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston to// yang dag par skul lo// yang dag parogazengs bstod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed
do gzhog go/ 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi/ don dam par nam yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen 2 rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa
dang/ gang gis thob par bya ba dang/ gang thob par bya ba gang yang med do// rab 'byor 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems
dba' sums dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de la sems can du dmigs pa med do// sems can du gdags par dmigs ba med do//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni sems can gyis dben pa'o/ [0f7c ]/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
zhi spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag pang skul te/ gos kyi bu dag rang bzhin
gyis stong pa nyid la ni/ chos gang ya nga zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la zhum zhing 'a ler 'gyur ba 'am gang gis zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba 'amo/ gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i
chos gang yang med de/ chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid las mi 'da' ba yin gyis// lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus skyed la/ le le bor te/ dge ba'i chos sbyin/
ba bam/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam 1 stong
tsam ba nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam bstong pa nyidadam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyidadas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid dam/ thogom
dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong ba nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ ma dmigs pa stong pa
nyid dam/ dngos bo med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa 'ango bo nyid stong pa nyidadam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam sasam/ yang dag pa ra shong ba rnams
sam[Y ]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa rnams sam/ 'phags
ba'i bden po rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sum/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug ba rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs
kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ ma 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am//
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag la brtson par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu dag stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cad sgrib pa med par rtogasangashag/ sgrib pa med
pa 'chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang med do zhes/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems ngang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'a tsha/ thabs mkhas pas sems
can rnams la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par ston to// yang dag par skul lo// yang dag par gzengs bstod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gzhog go/ 'dul lo// rab tu
'god do// ci nas kyang gnyis la mi gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// gnyis su med pa'i chos ni gang
la'ang gnas pa med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ thabs mkhas nga sa sems can rnams rang/
bzhin stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'debs shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i m/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod po 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes
rab batsha/ nang stong pa nyid dam phya stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngam/ stong pa nyid stong nyid dam chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa
mnyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa da dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyidi dam/
