chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs ba stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dag/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
tingastong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par song ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams sa ma/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi
yan khaga rnams sam/ 'phags pa' lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i sems
par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon
pa med pa 'am/ mngon pa shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa' stobs rnams sam/ ma 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so
so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ yang na byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson 'grus rtsoms la/ chos de dag gnyis bar yang
yid la ma byed cig/ ma gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos de dug na rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rangabazhin gyis stong pa nyid na ga sa
par yang yid la bya bam pa/ mig la sa par yang yode la bya ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/
thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa 'di la yongs su smin par byed do/ yongs su smin pa ra byas nas/ rim gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do// lan cig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do// dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do// rang byang chub la 'gong do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'god do/ 'ban/
mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tshe/ thangs
mkhas pas sems can samasu g.yeng ba rnams la'ang skad du 'demasashAng rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin sgom shag/ g.yeng ba'i 'du shes sam/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
'du shes su ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis song pa ste// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang g.yong ba 'am/ rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang ya nga dmags su
ma med do// khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de la gnas te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad na/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ bde kyis dge ba'i chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ngan/ tshul
khrims srung ngam/ bzod pa sgrub bam/ brtson 'grus rtsom mam ting nge 'dzin skyong ngam/ shes rab sgom mam/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ phyi nang stong
pa nyid la spyod dam/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyid la spyod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyod ngam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam// 'dus ma byas stong
pa nyid la sdod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyong dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa 'di la stod ngam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la byed dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod
ngal chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nying la spyod dam/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyod ngam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid la spyod dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la stod dam/ dran pa 2bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
la spyod dom/ dbang bo rnams la sbyod dam/ stobs rnams la spyod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod dam/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams la sprod dam/ bsam gtan rnams la sbyong ngam tshad med pa rnams la sbyong dam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyodadam/ rnam
bar thar pa brgyad la spyod ngam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba 'di dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la spyod dam/ mngon
par shes pa rnams la sbyong dam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyong dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod dam/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi la song dam/
so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la song dam/ byams pa chen pol spyong ngam/ sAng rje chen po la spyod dam/ dga' ba chen po la spyod dam/ btang snyoms chen po la spyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod dam/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam/ dpa byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod dam/ nyan thos kyi lam la spyod dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
lam la srong ngam/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la spyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sod dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sprod dam/
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyong dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyongangam rang byang chub lo spyod dam/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod dam/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la
spyong ngam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la song kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i chos de dag las gron chung dus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la song ba'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas le bar bzung nas
bar 'ga' yang las ma byed nga ra ma 'gyur gyi/ dge ba thams cad 'tshol zhing soms can rnams kyi don byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsnyen bkur
byang cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro sta/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de'ang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa la byang chub tu mngon par
sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs brjes kyang nam du'ang rnam par chud ma zo ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzungs thob cing/ lus kyi dbang po 'am/ ngag gi dbang po 'am/ yid kyi dbang
bom tam pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po ngas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pas/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu sgoms pa des/ lam thams cad shin tubasgoms po ra 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ byang chub sems
dpa' lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud mi za ba'i
tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing/ sems can rnams kyi don byed na/ 'gro
ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di las kyang yongs su ma nyam mo// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
tsha la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa can blo chung ba rnams mthong na/ 'di snang 'dems
shang rjes su ston te tshur rigs kyi bu lus dang ngag gam/ yid kyis las gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtogs shig dang/ khyod kyi lam thams
cad bdud rtsi ra 'bras bur 'gyur te/ mthar bdud rtser 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang 'jig par 'gyurab 'am/ yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang
dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid na yongs su nyams par ma 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa'i chos kyang gang ya nga med do// de ci'i
phyir zha na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa'i ng ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ng ma yin/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci zhig yongs su nyams par
'gyur zhes/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la 'dems shang rjes su
ston to// de ltar 'dems shing rjes su ston pa'i tshi/ nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa ma yin/ de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/
gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bgakyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la
yang ngag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la 'bar gnas par yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso
sbyin la lta bar gnas par yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la soms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yan/ bdag
kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la
snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan/
bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byams pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byams ba sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba
yin bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sang rje la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad bar snying rje sgom pa la yang dag par skul pa yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
par dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad pa'i dga' ba sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/
gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par btangasoms sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yan/ bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sems par 'jug pa la soms par 'jug pa
yin Da gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skya mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms
bar 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas sku mched gyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i snyam ched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la som
par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang nyung zad med pa'i snyemachod kyi snyom par 'jug pa la yang drag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes med 'dushes med min skya mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyom par 'ag pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa
yin gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sprul ba yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
la yang drag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sku la ba yin/ bdag kyang brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyan pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag pa'i skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/
gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lung
'dag par skul pa yin/ bdag kyang nang stong pa nyang sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yane/ bdag kyang phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/
gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yani/ bdag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang stong pa de
stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang chen po stong ba nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag
par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/
gzhan yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdagakyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang dag pa'i skul pa yin/
bdag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yan/ bdag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang thog ma dang tha ma mar pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan ya ngador ba med pa stong pa
nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang dag pa skul ba yin/ bdag kyang chos thams cad stong pa/
nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang ros thams cad stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid+masgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa lan/ gzhan yang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dngos po med pa stob/
pa nyid sgom pa yani/ gzhan yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang ngo bo 'ad stong pa nyid la yang dag
bar skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo de stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dngos po mad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dran pa nyi
bar gazhag pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dran pa nyabar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang yang dag par song ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par
spong ba rnams la yang dag par sprul ba yin/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa yin// gzhan yang rdza 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang
dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dbang bo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang stobs rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la
yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang byung chub kyi yan laga rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang
! rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/
bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la slob pa
yin gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang mngon par shes ba rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang mngon par shes
ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyasgo rnams
laslob pa yin/ gzhan yang g zu ngas kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu la slob ba yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs/
bcul yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang ma 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang ma 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang so so yang dag par
rig kha bzhi la slob pa yani/ gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang khyams pa chen po la
yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob
ba yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang mchen po'i
mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la dang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag
kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'adi shes pa spyad cing de la'ang m gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
shes pa spyod cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang lan cig phyi'i 'od pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang phyi'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ange shes bskyed
cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang 'u 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang ma gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang
dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi shes ba skyed cing de la'ang ma gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rang byang chub la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed pa yin/ gzhan yang lam de la 'dems shAng rjes su ston pa dang/ gzhog cing 'dul ba dang 'god pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tsho/ sems dang po bskyod pa nas nye bar bzung sta/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi
don byed pa'i tsho nam yang las med par gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na// rang
bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang ma dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos ma lags pa'i ngam dmagos na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan
0bo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par 'jug ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ driskad du smras pa bzhin
no chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la na/ sems can mi dmigs so// chos mi dmigs so// chos ma yin pa mdamags so// rab 'byor
gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par ma 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag pa/
rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong par mi ston to// rang bzhan gyis stong pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhan/ rab 'byor gzug
ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// tshor ba ni rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// 'du shes na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// 'du byed na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhan gyis stong ngo/
rab 'byor mig na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// rna bana'ang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sna nArang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lcan rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lus na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// med
ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sgra ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// drani rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// ronaMrang bzhin gyis stong ngo// reg na red
ban gyis stong ngo// chos nga bzhan gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor la ga rnam par shes pan rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rnaba'i rnam par shes pa na rang ratshan gyis
song ngo// sna'i rnam par shes pa nang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// yid kyi rnam paT shes
pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sna' 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong
ngo lce' 'dus te reg pa na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyas stongang// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor mag ga 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa btsun gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stob/
nga lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// yod kyi 'dus te reg pa' rkyen gyis tshor ba/
ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// chu'i khams na ring bzhin gyis stong ngo// med khams ni rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// rlung gi khams na
rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// nam mkha' khams na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor ma mig ba na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// 'du
khyadan rang bzhin gyis stong ngo/ rnam par shes pa na rang bzhan gyis stong nga/ mang dang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// skye mched drug na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// rig pa nArang bzhin
gyis stong ngo// tshor ba narang bzhin gyis stong ngo// srid pa ma rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// len pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// srid pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// skye ba ni rang bzhin gyis

stong ngo// rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// tshul khrims kyi b.rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// bzod pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// phyi nang stong ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo//

stong ba nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// chen po stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// don dam pa stong pa nyide na rang pazhin gyis stong ngo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid na ring bzhan
gyis stong ngo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyide nu'ing bzhan gyis stong ngo// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid

na rang nga zhin gyis stong ngo// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rang bzhin stong pa nying na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo/

rangag mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid murang bzhin gyis stong ngo// ngo bo nyi'i stong pa

nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 'di na ngeng bzhin gyis stong ngo// rab 'byor dran pa/bar gzhag pa rnams na rang pa zhan gyis stong ngo// yang dag par sbyong
ba rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// stobs rnams na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// byang
[é ]chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams na rang bzhin gyi stong ngo// bsam gtan
rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// tshad med pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams na rang bzhan gyi stong ngo/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni
tsam rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma mang pa dang/ smon pa med pa ni/
rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// mngon par shes pa rnams na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// teng nge 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// de bzhin
gshags pa'i stobs rnams na reng bzhin gyis stong ngo// mi 'jigs pa rnams na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// byams pa chen

po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sIng rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// dga' ba chen po na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bun rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu na ring bzhin gyis stong ngo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis
sbyong ngo// rang byung chub na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid na rang bzhan gyis song ngo/
bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ phung po lta na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// skye
mched bcu gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// khams bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyis

stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// stong pa nyid thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston

dran ba nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ra rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bu bar chos ston to// yang dag par song ba bzhani rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rang

bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// dbang po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// stobs lnga ni rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// byang chub kyi/
[% ]yan lag bdun na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa narang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams na
rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// bsam gtan bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// tshad med pa bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//
pa gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rnam par thar ba brgyad ni rang pazhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// mthar gyas
gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa ngagu na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa na reng bzhin

gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// mngon nga rabs ba ldan rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//
gzungs kyi sgo thams cad na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// mi 'jigs pa bzhin

rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// byams pa chen po na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar

chos ston to// sang rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// dga' ba chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis
stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis
stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bun rang bzhin gyis stong ngo/

zhes bya bar chos ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba'achos ston to// phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//

dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ rang byang chub na rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes
bya bar chos ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes
bya bar chos ston to// rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na nA/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad
rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur// gal te phyi stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin nan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos
thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
ma bos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par ma 'gyur ro// gal te stong pa zhing stong pa nyid rang bzhan gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo nas bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te chen po stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong
pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems ngaba' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te 'dus bus stong da
babasoms dpa'i soms ngang 'chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stang nga zhes bya bar da shananapad nga rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur// gal
de 'dus ma bsastong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan bar
mi 'gyur ro// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang tshub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo
zhes bya bar chos bstan par 'gyur ro// gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na na/ byang chub sems dang 'asams dpa' ni
ngos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin nani/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byung
chub sems drapa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan pa ra mi 'gyur ro// gal te chos thamasacad stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong
ba ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par ma 'gyur ro// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te
gi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rang bzhan gyis stong pa ma yin na naM/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par ma
'gyur ro// gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhan gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba/
chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo
zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin nan/ byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos
thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bshig par gyur na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid na 'jig par ma 'gyur
rtog nga ma yin te/ dris med par 'gro ba'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogasan ma gnas pa ste/ don gang nas kyang bong ba'ang ma yin/ gang du 'gro ba'ang
ma yin te/ de ni chos gnas pa nyung do// de la ni chos gang yang 'phel ba dmigs pa 'am/ sgrib pa dmigs pa 'am/ 'gong ba dmigs pa 'am/ skye ba dmags pa 'am/ 'byung ba
ngamigs pa 'am/ 'gag pa dmigs pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dmigs pa med do// de ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhan te/ de la gnas shing
byang ba sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ chos gang yang 'jug pa'i m/ mi rag par
mthong ba med do// chos thams cad na'ag pa med cing gnas pa med pa ste/ de na chos rnams kyi chos gnas nga'o// de bas na byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don
'di ltar des sgrib pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ chos thams cad na sgrib pa med par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bdag
mi dmigs/ bdag tu gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ sems can yang ma dmigs/ sems can du gdags nga 'ang mi dmigs/ srog ma dmigs/ srog tu gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs
'gro ba'ang mi dmigs/ 'gro bar gdags pa 'ang ma dmigs// gso ba'ang mi dmigs/ gso bar gangags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ skyes bu'ang ma dmigs/ skyes bur gdags pa 'ang ma
ngamigs/ gang zag kyang mi ngamigs/ gang zag khugadags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ shed can yang ma dmags/ 'ashadacan du gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ shed bdag kyang mi dmags/
ba shed bdag tu gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ byed pa po'ang ma demigs/ byed pa bor gdags pa 'ang mi dmigs/ tshor ba po'ang ma demags/ tshor ba bor gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ tsho
bar byed pa 'ang ma dmigs/ tshor bar byed par gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ song ba'ang ma dmigs/ slong bar gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ kun nas slong ba'ang ma dmags/ kun nas
slong bar gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ shes pa po'ang ma dmigs/ shes pa bor gdags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ mthong ba bo'ang mi dmigs/ mthong ba por gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs
gzugs kyang ma dmigs/ gzugs su gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ tshor ba'ang ma dmigs/ tshor bar gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ 'du shes kyang ma dmigs/ 'du shes su gdag
ba'ang mi dmigs/ 'du byed kyang mi dmigis/ 'du byed du gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ rnam par shes pa'i ng mdemags/ rnam par shes bar gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ mig kyang
ma dmigs/ mag tu gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ rnaba'ang ma dmigs/ rna bar gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ sna'ang mdamags/ snaragadags pa'i ng ma dmags/ lce'ang mi dmig
lcer gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ lus kyang mi dmigs/ lus su gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ yade kyang mi dmigs/ de du gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/
gzugs su gdags ba'ang mi dmigs/ sgra'ang mi dmigs sgrar gdags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ dri'ang ma dmigs/ drar gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ lo dang
ma dmigs/ ror gdabs pa'i ng ma dmigs/ reg kyang mi dmags/ reg tu gdags pa'i ng ma remigs// chos kyang ma dmegs/ chos su gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ mig gi rnam pa lnga//
bshes pa'i ng ma dmigs/ mig gi rnam par shes par gangags pa'i ng mi dmigs rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ng ma dmigs/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa 'ong ma dan gnya/ [']
rnam par shes pa'i ng mi dmigs/ sA'i rnam par bas par gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ng ma dmigs/ lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs
lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng mi dmigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes par gangags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ mad kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng ma dmigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ra gdags pa'i ng
mi dmags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ng mi dmigs mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa'i ng ma ngams rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ng ma ngamags/ rna ba' 'dus te reg par gdags/
ba'ang mi dmigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ng mi dmigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa'i ng mngamigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg nga 'ang ma dmigs/ lcab 'dus te reg par gdags/
bsaba'ang mi dmags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ng ma dmags// lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ng ma dmigs// yid kyi 'dus te reg par
gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa/
rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ sna' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ma dmigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ma dmigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'i ng mu dmigs/ yad kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'ang ma dmigs
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ sa'i khams kyang ma ngamags/ sa' khams su gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ chu'i khams kyang ma dmigs
chu'i khams su gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ me'i khams kyang ma dmigs/ me'i khams su gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs rlung gi khams kyang mi dam gas/ rlung gi khams su gdagu
pa'i ng ma dmigs/ nam mkha'i khams kyang mi dmags/ nam mkha'i khams su gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs// rnam par shes pa khams kyang ma dmags/ rnam
bar shes pa'i khams su gdags pa'i ng ma ngamags/ ma rig pa'i ng mi dmigs// ma rag nga 'a gdags pa'i ng mi dmags/ 'du byed kyang mdamags/ 'du byed du gdags pa'i ng ma/
ngamig/ rnam par shes pa'i ng mi dmigs/ rnam par shes par gdags pa'i ng ma ngamags/ ming dang gzugs kyang ma dmags/ ming dang gzugs su gdags pa'ong na ngamigs/ skye
mched drug kyang ma dmigs/ su mched drug tu gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ rig pa'i ng mi dmigs/ reg pa gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ tshor ba'ang mi ngan gas/ tshor bar gdags
pa 'ang mi dmigs/ srid pa'i ng mi dmigs/ srung pa ra gdags pa'i ng ma demags/ len nga rang ma ngamags/ len par gdags nga 'ang ma ngamigs/ srid pa'i ng mi dmigs/srid par
wA gdags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ skye ba'ang mi dmigs/ skya bar gangags pabang ma dmigs/ rga shi'ang ma dmags/ rga shar gdags pa 'ang ma dmigs/ sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lang
mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi nga rol phyin par gdags pa 'ang ma dmigs/
0bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng ma dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng ma dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi phurol tu
phyin par gdags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par gangags pa'i ng ma dmags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad/
mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa'ong ma dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid du gangags pa'i ng ma ngamigs 1 phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi
dmigs phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma ngamigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mdamags/
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmags/ chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi ngamigs/
don dam pa stong pa nyid du gangags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma dmags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma
dmigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma dmigs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma dmages
ka ku// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang ma dmigs/
shA dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma ngamigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi
dmags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mdamigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ mi
dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags
pa'i ng ma dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma dmigs ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags nga 'ang mi ngam gas/ dran pa nyabar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma ngamags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par bangags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
kyang mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong bar gdags pa'i ng ma nga'i gas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs dbang po rnams
kyang mi dmigs/ dbang por gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ stobs rnams kyang mi dmags/ stobs su gdags ba'ang ma dmags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma dmags/ byang
chub kyi yan lag tu gdags pa'i ng ma ngamags/ 'phags pa' lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ng ma dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi ngamigs/ 'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ pasam gtan rnams kyang ma demags/ bsam gtan du gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/
tshad med pa rnams kyang ma dmigs/ tshad med par gdags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ gzugs med pa'i soms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma dmags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
par gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma dmigs/ rnam par thar par gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs mthar gyis gnas pa'i so mas par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma
dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i ng mi dmigs/
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med par gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang sa de mugs/ mngon par shes par gdags
pa'i ng mi dmags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin du gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mdamags/ gzungs kyi sgor gdag
pa'i ng ma dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams kyang ma dmigs/ de bzhin ga shegs pa'i stobs sugadags pa'i ng ma ngamigs/ ma 'jigs pa rnam sa kyang mi dmigasA/ mi
'jigs par gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig par gdags pa 'ang mdamugs/ byams pa chen po'ang ma demag
byams pa chen por gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ snying rje chen po 'ang mi dmigs/ snying rje chen por gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma dmigs/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang ma ngamigs// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang ma dmigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ phyi'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang ma dmage/ phyi'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras
bur gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmanges/ dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa'i ng mi dmigs/ rang byang chub kyang mi dmags/ rang byang chub tu gdags pa'i ng
ma dmigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma dmigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyung du gdags pa'i ng ma dmags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma dmags/ rnam pa thamA
cad mkhyen pa nyid du gangags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ mchen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang ma demags/ ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gdags pa'i ng ma dmigs/ dang
byad bzang po brgyad cu 'ang ma dmigs/ ngab byad bkrung po brgyad cur gdags pa 'ang ma dmigs na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom za bar 'gyur ba lta ga
las 'ong/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de ba zhin gshegs pas sprul ba 'a dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dgo bsAn ma la bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong du mar rgyun du chos bstanan/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprule pa de dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba lta ga la yod dam/ lan cig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba yod
ngam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na ma lags te/ de ci'i sad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
rab 'byor de de bzhin no// dede bzhin te/ chos thums cad la dngos po med na/ sems can gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun du zhugs/
ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byung
chub tu dgod par bya ste// gzhan du na phyin ci log gis yongs su 'khris pa'i skye dgu dag phyin ci log med pa la gzhag go/ 'dul lo// zab tu 'god do// phyan gyi log gang yin ba
de'ang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir phyin ci log ma yin pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa med pa ni phyin ci log ma yin pa'o// gang la phyin ci log med pa de la bdag med do// sems can
mad do// srog mod do/ 'gro ba mad do// gas pa med do// skyes bu med do// gang zag mad do// shaducan med do// shad bdag med do// byed pa po mad do// tshorab pod do//
shes pa po med do// mthong ba po mad do// de la gzugs med do// tshor ba med do// 'du shes med do// 'du byed med do// rnam par shes pa mong do// de la mig med ngo// rnab med/
do sna med do// lce med do// lus med do// yad med do// de la gzugs med do// sgra mdado// dri med do// ro med do// reg med do// chos med do// de la mig gi rnam par
[n]shes pa med de// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med de// sna'i rnam par shes pa med do// lce'i rnam ba shes ba med do// lus kyi rnam pardzashes pa mad do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa med
do de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do// rnaba' 'dus te reg pa med do// sna 'a 'dus te reg pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// yid
kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// de la mig ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// rna ba' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// sna'i 'dus te reg nga 'a rkyen gyis tshor ba
med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis mo'i ba med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mang do// de la sa'i
khams med do// chu'i khams med do// ma'i khams med do// rlung gi khams med do// nam mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// de la ma rig pa med do/
'du byeng do/ rnam par shes pa mang ngo// mang dang gzugs med do// skye mched drug mad do// reg pa med do// tshor ba mad do// srid pa med do// len pa mad do// srid pa
mad do// skye ba med do// rgashi med do// de la spyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do// brtson 'grus
kyi bu rol tu phyin pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba med do// de la nang stong pa nyid med do// bu stong pa nyid/
med do// byin ng stong pa nyid med do// stong pa nyid stongapa nyid med do// chen po stong pa nyid med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do// 'dus ma byas stong
ra nyid medado/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mod do// thog ma dang tha ma mad pa stong pa nyid med do// dor ba mad pa stong pa nyid med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do/ chos tham
cad stong pa nyid med do// rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do// ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do// dngos bo med pa stong pa nyid med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do// yang dag par spongab rnams med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med do// dbang po rnams med do// stobs
rnams med do/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mang ngo// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mad do// bsam gtan rnams med do//
tshang med ba rnams mod do// gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do// de la rnam par thar ba rnams med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do//
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa med do// mngon pa shes pa rnams mad do// ting nge 'dzin rnams mad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do/
de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do// ma 'jigs pa rnams med do// so so yang dag par rag pa rnams med do// byams pa chen po med do// snying rje chen bo mad do// sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad mang do// de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mang ngo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// dgra bcom pa nyid med do//
rang byang chub mad do// de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
bam bo nyis brgya gya lnga ba// gang la gzugs med pa dang/ tshor ba med pa dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ 'du byang mad pa dang/ rnam pa ra shes pa med pa dang/ gang la mag
mad pa dang/ rna ba med pa dang/ sna mad pa dang/ lce mad pa dang/ lus med pa dang/ mde med pa dang/ gang la gzugs med pa dang/ sgra med pa dang/ dramad pa dang/ ro mad pa
dang reg med pa dang/ chos med pa dang/ gang la mig ga rnam bka shes ba med pa dang/ rnaba'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang/ sna'i rnam bkra shas ra mang pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa/
dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang/ yid kyi ma par shes pa med pa dang/ gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang/ rnaba'a'i dus te reg pa med pa dang/
'dus te reg pa med pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mang pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang/ gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba

mad pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mad pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa' rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang/ gang la sa' khams med pa dang/ chu'i khams med pa dang/ ma' khams med pa dang/ rlung gi kham
mang pa dang nam mkha'i khams mad pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang/ gang la ma rig pa mad pa dang/ 'du byed med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa dang/ ming dang gzugs
mad pa dang/ skye mched drug med pa dang/ reg ba med pa dang/ tshor ba med pa dang/ srid pa med pa dang/ len pa med pa dang/ srid pa mad pa dang/ slu ba med pa dang/ rga shi med pa dang/ gang la
sbyin pa'i ba rol tu phyin pa med pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mad pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med ba dang/ bsam gtan gyi

za00 pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mang ba dang/ gang la nang stong pa nyid med pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa
dang/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa dimad pa dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med
pa dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa dang/ rang ga mtshan

tid stong pa nyidi med pa dang/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mad pa dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang/ dngos po med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa
dang/ gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa dang/ yang dag par song ba rnams med pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams med pa dang/ dbang po rnams med pa dang/ stobs rnams med
pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa dang/ gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams med pa dang/
tshad med pa rnams med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med pa dang/ gang la rnam par thar pa brgyad med pa dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
mang ba dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 'di dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa rnams med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin/
rnams mang pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams med pa dang/ gang la de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams med pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams med pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med pa
dang / byams pa chen po med pa dang/ snying rje chen po med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad med pa dang/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid med pa dang/ rang byang chub med pa dang/ gang la thams cad shas pa nyid med pa dang/ lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa ting med pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mang pa de na rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
byin pa la spyod ba de/ shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ sems can phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams sems can gyi 'du shes las 'grel te gzugs kyi 'du shes las bgrel to//
gzugs med pa'i 'du shes las 'grel to// zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to// gang zag pa med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dranapa lta bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang/
ngag pa' spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ rnam par
thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ ting nge 'dzin thums cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
so so yang dag par 'ag pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang/ de la don dam pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma
yin te/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa dang ma skyes ba dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// de nas ngs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
rnams kyi byang chub sta/ dal bdag med do// sems can med ngo// srog med do// skyo ba med do// gso ba med ngo// skyes bu mdado// gang zag med do// bshed can med do// shed bdag
mad do// byed pa po med do// tshor ba bo med do// shes pa po med do// mthong ba po mad do// gzugs med do/ tshor ba med do// 'du shes med do// 'du byung med do// rnam par shes pa
med do// mag med do// rna ba med do// sna med do// lce med do// lus med do// yid med do// gzugs med do// sgra med do// dri mad do// romad do// reg med do/
chos med do// mag gi rnam par shes ba med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa med do// lce'i rnam par nges pa med do// lus kyi rnam pa'i ng shes pa med do// yid kyi
rnam par shes ba med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do// rnab 'i 'dus te reg pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do//
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mang do// sna' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// lce'i
'dus te reg nga 'a rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa brkyen gyis tshor ba med do// sa' khams mad do// chu'i khams
med do// ma' khams mad do// rlung gi khams med do// nam mkha'i khams mang do// rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// ma ga pa med do// 'du byed med do// rnam pa bshes pa med
do ming dang gzugs med do// skyo mched drug mang ngo// reg pa mad do// tshor ba mad do// sred pa med do// len pa mad do// srid pa med do// skye ba med do// rga shi mad do// sbyin pa'i pa
chol tu phyin pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// brjod pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi ba rol tu phyin pa med do// bsam gtan gyi ba lob tu ban pa med do//

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mad ngo// nang stong pa nyid med do// phyi stong pa nyid med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid mad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do// chen po stong pa nyid med do// don dam
ba stong pa nyid med do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 'di mad do// thogam dang tha ma med ba stong ba nyid mad do// dor ba med/
pa stong pa nyid med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do// rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do// ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid mad ra/ dngos po med pa stong pa

nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do// yang dag par spong b rnams mad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnamA
med do// dbang po rnams me dado// stobs rnams med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa med do// 'phags pa 'a bden pa rnams med do//
bsam gtan rnams mang ngo// tshad med pa rnams med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do// rnam par thar pa brgyud med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
u da/ pa dgu mang ngo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa med do// mngon par lus pa rnams me da do// ting nge 'dzin rnams mad do//
gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med do// ma 'jigs ba bzhimad do// so so yang dag par rig ba bzhi mad do// byams pa chen po med do// snying rje chen po
med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyung mad do/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mang do// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med de/ lan cig
phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// dgra bcom pa nyid mad do// rang byang chub mod do// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de
mang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhan ngu na/ rang bzhin stong pa 'ang longs su shes pa las/ lam gyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu 'jug pa/
mad de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'ang sa nas kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid/ phyin chad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid/ bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de/ de nam yang rang bzhin
gyis mi stong pa ma yin no// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ sems can du 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams
kyi sems can gyi 'du shes yongs su dkrol ba'aphyir/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 'ad la sbyod do// de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi lam dang/ nga/
sangs rgyas kyi lam dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang/ lam thams cad la spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/ sam
can rnams yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgu bar byas nas/ tsha'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag zhu sogs
tshogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di lta sta/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
rgyun mi gcod do// nga na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi
tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ga sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang
bzhin stong pa nyid do/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dzasnyad cig bzhugs shang/ 'tsho skyong ba de dag ga sa ngas rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta
ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ rang bzhin stong ba nyidan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma gtogs par/ gzhan las 'jig rten du 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro/ de
bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngos rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/ de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid 'as yongs su nyams par ma 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad la spyod cing/ gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshor ba'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'du shes
a kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'du byed kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stongang nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzhan
no mig kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnaba'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stongapa nyid kyang gzhan no//
lce'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yid kyang gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// gzug
kyang gzhan no// rang bzhani stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sgra 'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// shing gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ro'ang/
gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rag kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chos kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mig gi/
rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyidakya gzhan no// rnaba'i rnam par shas pa 'a ngagazhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ng bgazhan
na rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rna ba'i
'dus te reg pa 'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sa'i 'dus te lag pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// lce'i 'dus te reg bu'ang gzhan no//
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mo/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
ngag/ gzhan no// mag la 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'angagazhan
no rung ba zhani stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// sna 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lceb 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sa'i khams kyang gzhan no// nga bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chu'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid/
kyang gzhan no// ma'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rlung gi khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan
no rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhano// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no ma'og la yang gazhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
no 'du byed kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam par shes ba'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// skye mched drug kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// rig pa'i ng ga zhanano/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshor ba'ang gzhan no// rang
bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// sred pa 'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa 'di kyang gzhan no// len pa 'ang gzhan no rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// srid pa'i ng gzhan no// rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// skyo ba 'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ga zhanano// rga shi'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng
gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan no/ rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// brtson 'grus kyi parol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gazhan no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//

blo stong pa nyid kyang gzhano// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzhagano// khyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// stongapa nyid stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gazhan no// chen po stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin
stong ba nying kyang gzhan no/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa de kyang gzhan no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// der ba
mad ba stong pa nyid kyang ga zhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba
nyid kya gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// me dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/

rang bzhin stong pa nyung kyang gzhan no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong
pa tid kyang gzhan no/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dbang po rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// stobs rnams kyang/
gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// byang chub kyi ba na lag rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'phags pa 'a lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ng gzhan no//
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa
tid kyang gzhan no// tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gazhan ni/ gzugs med pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan no// rnam par thar pa brgyud kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan no// rnam bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa 'angagazhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mngon par shes pa rnams
kyang gazhanano 'ang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin/
stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan no// rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// byams pa chen po'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan no// snying rje chen po'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rgyun
du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'a na cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// phyir ma 'ong
pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no// rang ba zhan stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ga zhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang byang chung kyang gzhan no// rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stod
pa ting kyang gzhan no zhes bgyi bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par ma bgyid kyi gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang

[m/]gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang rang ba zhan stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyar kyang 'du shes so// 'du

byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa sngar shes pa'o// mig

ting kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshig go/ rna ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce 'di kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus 'di kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhane stong pa nyid
kyang lus so// yur nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so//

sgra nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dra'i// ro nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg tir kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do// rang bzhin stongapa nyid kyang chos
so/ mig gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig ga rnam par shes pa'o/ darnaba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o stsal rnam par shes pa 'di kyang rang bzhan stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes
la'o lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang nga zhin stong pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'as kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam pa rang shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam pa rang shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te

reg pa red kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa ting do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna
ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// le'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
do/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang rtse'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'o// yid kyi

[z]'dus te reg pa de kyang rang ba yin stong pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mal ba 'dus te reg pa la rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig ga 'dusute reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba' 'dus

te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba// lcang
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor

btang kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa da
do rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu kham
nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nying do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// che' khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung
ga khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhan stong
ba hrid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ted kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa shes pa 'a khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs 'ad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang zhan stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// su mchog

drug nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ rag pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg pa 'o// tshor ba nyid
kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sred pa 'o// len pa de kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sring pa 'o// skya ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga sha 'de kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang cha sha'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ brtson 'grus kyi pA rol tu byon pa nyid
kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyeng kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//

nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa 'di kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bu stong pa

nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen bo stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang don dam ba stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dus byas stong
pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong/

ny+nyo ba tir do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyung ngo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha

na med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhan stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong

ba ting do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid do// ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyidado// rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dran pa khyabar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par song ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par song ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbang po
rnams so// stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'gas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'o/
'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bdan pa rnams so// bsam gtan tid kyang rang bzhan stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
zakyang// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ gzugs med pa 'i snyams
y+Ya khar 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
bar 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stongab nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa ra thar
ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong nga nying do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/

ting nge 'dzani nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzan rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzungs
kyi go rnams so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang
rang bzhin stong ba nyid do// rang pa zhin stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag
