par rig pa rnams so// khyams pa chen po nyid kyang r nga ba zhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen bo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang snying rjechen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun du zhug
ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir ma 'ong pa'i 'bras bu'o//

dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa 'di do/ rang bzhan stong pa nyid kyang rang byung

chub bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'a ma gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa
[… ]/ nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa ting ngo zhes bgyi par spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sAl
pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du snyas ba bzhin te/ rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'ang gzhan la//
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du shes kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i ng
gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa 'di kyang gzhan/ mag kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa 'ad kyang gzhan/ sna'ang gzhan la/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'ang gzhan la// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yod kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin/
b+haM stong ra nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sgra'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa de kyang gzhan/ dri'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid/
kyang gzhan/ ro'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ reg kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
0mag gi rnam pa drangashes pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ga zhan/ rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan la
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa 'ad kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ng gzhan l/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa 'ad kyang gzhan/ rna pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i ng gzhan
la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'ang gzhan '/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lca'i 'dus te reg pa 'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i ng gzhan la/ rangabazhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yad kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba 'ong ga zhan la/ rang ba zhin stong pa nyid kyang ba zhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg parkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ me'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang ga zhan/ rlung gi khams kyang gzhan la// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan 2 rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
gzhan la// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ma rig pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stongang nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i ng
gzhan l/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
rig pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ srid pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
lenapa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ srid pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'ang gzhan la/ rong bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rga
sha 'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan l/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ bzod pa'i lA rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la rang bzhin stong
pa ting kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa 'di kyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhon/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/
0 ga/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rang mtshan nyid stong ba nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid kyang gzhan l/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan
la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
N+NaM kyang gzhan/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan/
la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i ma yan lag brgyad pa'i ng gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs med pa'/
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i son
par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa meng pa'i ng gzhan la rang ban song pa 'ad
kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo/
rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa 'di kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan la// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen po'ang gzhan la// rang nga zhan stong pa nyid kyang gnan/
sang rje chen po'angagazhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang pa gzhan/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu lo nga gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan 'a/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yin te/
gal te gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin n na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang [”] gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du
chud par byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sams
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya sta/ rab 'byor gang ba phyir tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'
phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya'o// gal te 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin nan/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'a chen po 'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
par 'tshang ma rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ nga' phu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang la chen po 'dushes rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong
du chud par byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na na/ byang chub
sems dpa'i sams dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pas
na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing blun med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma mnan ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
ga byung chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma rgya sta/ rab 'byor gang gi phyi'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
gal tu ma ga rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin nan/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'ang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
mirgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir mig rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par
byas shang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byang chub tu na ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'/
soms dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngasan/ de'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rma ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba khong du chud par byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs/
bar 'tshang rgya'o// gal te sna rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya sta/ rab 'byor gang gi phyiri sna rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ nga'i phyir byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po sna rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du
chud par byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te lce rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems
dang 'asams dang 'a chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lce rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lce rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa snga mchapa/
rgya'o gal te lus rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
bar 'tshang mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lus rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud
bar byas shing/ blun mang po yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te yid rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yun nan//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang banamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya sta/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir yid rang bzhin gyis stong
bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po yad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud pa ra byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhage ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po'ang bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya sta/ rab 'byor gang gi bya'i gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis/
stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te sgra rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma rgya sta/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sgra rang bzhin gyis stong pas

zla bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam mi stong zhisabya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par
ma byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams stong ba 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// dbang po rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par
'khrug par ni khyod do// stobs rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya
bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stongapa 'am/ 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
stod pa 'am/ 'on tam ma song zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// bsam gtan rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// na
yod pa rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byad do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam
bar 'khrug par ma byed do// rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma song zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
stong ba 'am/ 'onatam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma
stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tan ma song zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par yabyed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa
'am/ 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// gzus kyi sgo rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam pa' 'khrug par mi byed do// de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// ma 'jigs nga rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par
ma byed do// so so yang dag par mgu ba bzhi stong ba 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// byams pa chen po stong pa 'am/ 'on
tamam stong zhes bya bar rnam bar 'khrug par mi byed do// snying rje chen po stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
stong pa 'am/ 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stongapa 'am/ 'onatam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do//

par 'khrug par ma byed do// dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa 'am/ 'onatam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rang byang chub stong pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar
rnam pa 'khrug par ma byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub song pa 'am/ 'on tam ma stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do/
zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa 'ang ni/ 'di ni gzugs so// 'di ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid do zhes/ gzugs rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ 'di ni tshor ba'o//

ni 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// 'di ni rtsi'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// rang bzhanastong pa nyid ni/ 'di ni

'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni

par ma byed do// rang bzhin stong pa de ni/ 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin/
pa rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ 'dun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes

g shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do// 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid do zhes/ nang stong pa nyidi/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ 'di na phyi nang stong pa nyid do// 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyade kyi stong pa nyid do zhes/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
nang 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid// 'di ni stong pa nyid stongapa 'di kyi stong pa nyid do zhus/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rang bzhani stong pa nyid na/
'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do// 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ngo zhes/ chen po stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid na/ 'di ni don dam pa

'dra na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi song pa 'di do zhes/ 'dus ma byas stongapa nying rnam par 'khrug por ma byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ 'di ni mthA' las 'das pa stong pa 'di do/
'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 'di kyi stong pa nyid do zhes/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma mang

nyid ni/ 'di na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di na ngo bo nyid stong pa de kyi stong pa nyid do zhes/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyidan/ 'ad ni

khyod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ 'di dag na yang dag bar srong ba rnams so// 'di ni yang dag par song b rnams kyi stong pa nyid do zhes/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rnam par 'khrug/
