phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi da susargyus kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang naM' ma lta bur shes so// sgra bar n lta bu dang/ mgi nor lta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ sgyu ma lta bu dang/ sprul pa lta bur shes so//

da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ thams cad shes pa nyidarmi lam lta bu shes so// sgra'an lta bu dang/ mig yo blta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ sgyu ma lta bu dang/ sprul pa lta bu pags so/

da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyilalaspyodang 'tsho/ lam gyi rnam par s pa tad rmi lam lta bur shesaso// sgrubaren lta bu dang/ mig yor ltabudang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang sgyum lho bu dang/ sprul ba lta bu shis so// nga

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 'tshe/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shasaso// sgrubatonalta bu dang/ mgayor lta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ sgyum lta bu dang/ sprul pa lta bur shes so
de she'ang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sems can dedag thams cad kyang rna 'am laspyod do zhes bya bar shes so// sgra bar n la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// mig yoja' spyod do zhes

bya bar shes so// smig rgyu la spyod do zhes bya bshes so// sgyu ma la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// sprul pa la spyod do zhes byabarngas so// dbas nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

b.rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod pa'i tshe/ lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po mdabar 'dzinate/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sgo/

sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams dngos kho mo da par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de thob par byadado// sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ mig yor lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po

med par 'dzin te/ de ltar b zung zhing rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ smig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin to/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa

thamasacang mkhyen pa te thob par byed do// shas 'bakyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyodapa'i tsha/ sbyam lta bu'i gnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/de ltari bzung zhing nam pa thams cad mkhyenapa de thob par byed do// shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i tshe/ sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams ngas ngo med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

sa 'ang gzurumed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin r khang gzung du med do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra gzung du med do// bzod pa la rol tu phyin pa'i ng gzung du med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin nga 'ang

wA gzung du med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pabang gzung du ma dado// nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du

med do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du mang ngo// mtha' las 'das//

pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du me da do// thogamadang tha ma med pa stongs nyid kyang gzung du mdapo/ der ba med pa stongar nyid kyang gzung du med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// chos thams cad stong

ba nyid kyang gzung du med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa dkyang gzung du med do// ma dmigs pa stong pa nyidakyang gzung du med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang

gzung du med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzung du med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

051pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// dbang po rnams kyang gzung du medado// stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzung du med do// 'phags pa'i lam nan lag brgyad pa'i ng
gzung du med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzung dumed do// bsam gtan rnams kyang gzung du med do// tshad med pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamA
kyang gzung du med do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang phalas gzung du med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan

ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa 'ang gzung du med do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// ting nge 'dzina rnams kyang gzung du mad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung du med do// de bzhin gsheg

pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// sAng rje chen po'ang gzung du med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'chen po chos thams cad gzung du med par shes par byas pa'i nga/ blanang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du ga tur to/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gzung du med cing dngos po med pa ste/ rma'i ma lta bu/ sgra bar n lta bu/ mig yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu ste/ sems
can rnams kyis chos de dag ma shes/ ma mthong ba/ ma gtogs pa/ gzung du med pa'i chos kyis// gzung du med pa'i chos gang yang thob par mi nus pas// de'i phyir byang chub sem dpa'/

gnas dang 'chan po sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'dzugaste/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas lte bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gang cagatong ya ngasems can thams cad

kyi don du gtong ngo// tshul khrims gang nya srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don du srung ngo// bzod pa gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom mo// brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang sums can thams cad kyi don du
rtsomamo// bsam gtan gang cal mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can rnams kyi don du mnyam par zhog go/ shes rab gang ca sgom yang sems can rnams kyi don du sgom ste/ bdag gi don du ma yin no// byang chung

skye sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gangasam
can bad pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ bdag mad pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ srog med pa la srogag 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ 'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa/

dang gso ba med pa lagasor 'byed shesasu gnas pa dang/ skyes bu med pa la skyes bu'i 'du gsu gnas pa dang/ gang zag med pa la gang khrag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ shad can med pa la shed can gyi 'du shes su

gan ba dang/ shing bdagamed pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ byed pa po mad pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ byed du 'jug pa po mad pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa

dang slong ba po med pa la song ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ slong du 'jug pa po med pa la slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shesasu gnas ba dang/ tshor ba po med pa la tshor ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ tshor

du 'jug pa po mar pa la tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ gsang po med pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang/ mthong ba po med pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyin ci log lasa rnam

bar 'gyel te/ phyin ca leg las rnam par bkrol zhing/ 'chib med pa'i dbyings su 'god do// de la bkod nas rgyub 'daregayongs su margyu ste/ bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gyi 'du shes sam/ srog ga 'du shes sam/
'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gsob 'du shes sam/ skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/ gang zag gi 'du shes bam/ shad rgyun gyi 'du shes sam/ shing bdagag 'du shes sam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du
'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ slong ba po'i 'du shes sam/ slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/ tshoradu 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ shes pa po'i du shes ma/ mthong ba
po'i 'du shes yongs su ma ste/ de g.yo ba dang/ rlomasems dang/ dar ba dang/ smos pa lad ngag btang nas/ spros pa med pa'i sems kyis 'bar bslabasagang ma ngadu sbyong de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs
des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ bdag nyid kyang chos gang la'angaman par chen patshad la/
sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa'i ng b.larab tu 'god de/ den 'jig rten gyi khro snyad kyi/ don dam par n me yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pasachos gang/

ts+tshA mngon parardzogs par sangs rgyas pa de 'jigertanagyi thosnyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi ngon dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa do bgon gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes khyaban 'jig rtenagyi h+pha sang du brjod pa sa/ de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bad

lta bu gang yang ma dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ad lta ste/ chos 'dasengos 'ad lta bu nage mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa sta/ gnyis kyis nagang yang thob pa ma/mngon
par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de staganyisakyis thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs par gyur ba ma mchis na/ gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs par
'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ gnyis kyis kyang thob ba dang/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyurab mngade/ gnyis su med pasakyang thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba mang da/

gang laganyis kyang chad la/ mi gnyis pa'i ng yod pa ni thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar rangane thebapa'o// 'angana'angonapar rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba na sngos pa ste/ chos
mnyam pa nyid lasngos pa mang de/ spros pa med panachos manyam pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngeb nying rnams la/ chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis bsu ba'ang gang zhig/
mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang la dngos po med pa dang/ ngos po med pa'i ng ma yin pa dang/ ngo bo nyid med pa dang/ yongs su brjod pamad pa 'di ni tshesamanyam pa nyide ra/ chos
mnyam pid po da brjod du med pa'o// chos manyam pa nyid ma gtogasapar yang dmigs par 'gyur partsis gang yang mad de chos mnyam pa nyidan chos thams cad las rnam bar 'dasapa'o/
chos mnyam pa nying na byas pa snyam/ 'phagasapa'i m/ chos gang gnyis kyang shes par mi rung zhing yul ma yin pa'o// gsolapa/bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid po dang bzhanagshegs par phul yang m
lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ rab 'abyor chos manyam panyingan 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i m/ lan cig phyire'ong bam/ phyiram 'ongaba'am/ dgra bcom pa/
mdang byang nub bam byang chub sems dpa' m/ de bzhinugashegasapa yul ma yin no gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das debakonegshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi
yul lamanga' sbyang bzhi lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'abyor gal te chos manyam ba nyid kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i//

sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yazhin/ dobazhin gshegasapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyuran/rab 'byor so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos manyam pa

nyid gang yin pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos manyam 'dang gang yin pa dang/ lanacig phyir 'ong b rnams kyi rosamanyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma 'ong ba rnams kyi chos manyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang/

dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos manyam pa nyid kyang yin pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ngos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams kyi chos manyam pa nyid gang yin pa de namanyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nying dang mi mnyam pa de la bya brag gang yang nga ngo/ de ltar so so skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang/
'jags ba thams cad kyimanyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gtsagab la 'don so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni gyen du zhugs pa'o// 'dzinalan cig phyire 'ong ba'o//
'danores 'ong ba'o// 'danoreg bcom ba'o// bzhiring sangs rgyas so/ 'dan byang chub sems dpa' 'o// 'di norebazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes
ngaganyis subya bamadad/ rnam par rtog pa dedagadamanyam ba nyidalam ramagis so/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stachos thamasacad mnyam nyid la/ 'disoso'i kho'o/ dzazhin du zhugs pa'o//
'daninacig phyir 'ong ba'o// dazhi khyorem 'ong ba'o// 'dan degrubcom pa'o// 'angani nga sangs rgyas so// nobyang chub samasadapa'i 'o// 'ani de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'anemapar rtog pa de dgam gesan/ dasaso sa'i skye rnams dang/ rgyun du zhugs rnams dang/ lanatsagetur 'ong b rnams dang/ rim 'ong ba rnams dang//
dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang// dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhaneno// dedi bzhinatu(chos thams cad mnyam panyid lnga so so'i skyabo rnams dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnabasadang/ lan cig phyir 'ong b rnams
dang phyiram 'ong ba rnams dang/ grubcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
khyad par mngado// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de stachos thams cad nyam nyid laso so'i skya bo rnams dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong b rnams dang/ bya ma'ong b rnams dang//
gra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub samasang ba rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par mamawi/
na bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos dkon mchog dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog dang/ dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsalapa rab 'byor de rjesnyam du sems// sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig
yin snyam log gse la pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rten 'tshal nga ltar na/sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang ngagazhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/dge 'dun dkon
mchog kyang gzhan zhig la dachos mnyam pa nyid kyang gazhanam lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dakon mchog gang lags pa dang/ ches dkon mchog gang lags pa dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lag

ba de nyid chos ma nyam pa nyid de chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa 'ang ma lags/mi ldan pa'i ng ma lags gzugasam mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ rdzogs pa ma mchis pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste 'di ltar

mtshan nyidam mchis pa'o//de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyidamamachis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye ba'o//'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o//'di ni 'dan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di na dgra bcom pa'o//

[c]'din dang sangs rgyas so/'di ni byang chub sems dang 'a 'od 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/mtshan nyidamed pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul/ den de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mthu'o// rab 'byord ji snyam du sems/ de sta de bzhin gshegs pa dgacom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la// mngon pa rdzogs
par sangasam rgyas pa'i phyi'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pamadzangan/ sems can myal yod par mngon nam/ byol song gi skyo gnas yod par mngon nam/gan rje'i 'jig rten yod pa mngon
ya/ma yodapa mngon nam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rosekyi lce yod par mngon nam/ sumanurtsa gsum lha yod par mtshon nam/ mtsho ma lha yod par mngon nam/ dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mananam/
la dgar lha yod par mngon nam/ gzhan 'phrul dbangabyed lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngonanam tshangs lhanyeban lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod
paramanam/ tshangasan gyi lho yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha yod par mananam/ chung snang gi lha yodapangamangomanam/ tshad med snang ba'i lha yod par mngonanam/ kun snang dang bag lha yod
panga mngonanam/ dba'ilce yod par mngon nam/ rlung dag yod par mngon m/ tshadamang dgabatsalha yod par mngonanam/ ngag rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ cha ba'i lha yod
para mngonanam/ chung ma'i lha yod pa ra mngonanam/ tshad mad cha ba'il yod par mngon nam/ 'bras bur bar lha yod par mngonanam/ mche ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ mi gdung ba'i lha yod pa ma
nam shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gya nom snang ba lha yod par mngon nam 3'og man gyi lha yod par mngonanam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchad kyi lha yod par mngon nam rnam shes

mtha' yas stsamachodakyi lha yod par mngon nam/ nyung klad lang pa'i skyemachid kyi lha yod par mngon nam/'du shes med 'du shesamadamin skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa yod par mngon nam

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yodapaja mngonanam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ brtson 'grusakyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon na// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tungan pa yod par mngon nam/

shes rab kyapha rol tuphun pa yod par mngon na// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam/ nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ ba stong pa nyid yodapara mngonanam/ panang stong pa de yod par mngon m/

stong pa nyid stong panyid yod par mngon nam/ chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dusabyas stong pa nyid yod par mngonanam/ dusamabyas stong ba nyid yod par
mngon nam/ mtha' sa 'das ba stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ thog mang klu mchod pa stong pa nyid bod pa mngon nam/ ded bamad pa stong nyid yod par mngon nal/ rang bzhane stong pa de yod par/
mngon nas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rangag mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon sa/ mdamagesapastong panyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po med pastong pa nyid yod pa mngon nam/

ngo bo nyide stong ba nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyade stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa mngon nam/ yang dag par song brnabs yodapa mngon nam/ rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang b rnams yod par mngon nam/ bangapo rnams yod bda mngonanam/ stobasa rnams yod par mngonan// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i badanapa rnams yod par mnanam/ bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon/ ]tshadamod pa rnams yodapara mngon ma 2 gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams
yod par mngon m/ rnamapa rab rnams bod par mngonanam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yodapar mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyidadang/ mtshan ma mdab dang/ smon pa
mang ba yodapara mngonanal/ mngon par shesapa rnams yod par mngon nam/ dpenge 'dzana rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon m/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par
[@] ]mngon m/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yong pa ra mngonanam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bod par mngon nam/ byams pachen po yod pa mngon na// snying rje chen po yod pa mngon ma/
sangs rgyas kyatshesam 'dus pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ man po'i mtshan sum zhu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/ dpe byadabang po brgyadanu yodabanga mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon
dam chos dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam 3nyanathos kyi thig pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas theg pa yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
yod par mngon nam klog pan po yod par mngon nam/ dad pa'i rjes su'angab yod par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su brangab yod par mngonanam/ brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ rgyun duzhug pa
yod par mngon m/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ dgra bcom pa yod par mngonanam/ rang sangs rgyas yong ba nga mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa'
yod par mngon nam// debanan gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasachos de dag klams cad mchis pa mngon par mi
'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bsan/ de lta chos manyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yol/ chos rnams rnam par dgong pa mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bal po sumabargya pa/ gsob pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dbazhin gshagasang/

tshos mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yo ba de bzhin du/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos ra/ma pa nyare las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ dbadaredudad pa'i rjes su 'brang b rnams kyang chos manyam pa nyid lasam g.yo ba
lags sam/ de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang b rnams kyang ngos mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yob lags sam de bzhin du brgyad pa'i ng chos mnyam pa nyid lasamagayo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du
rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang ngos mnyam panyid lasam g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos manyam pa nyid lasam po b.lags sam/ de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba
rnams kyang ngos mnyam pa nyid lasam g.yo ba 'gasasam/ de bzhin du grubcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ dbazhin du rang sangs rgyas kyang chos manyam pa
'dalasam g.yo ba sags sam/ de bzhin du byang chub sams byung 'ayang ngos mnyam nyid las ma gso ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa// rab 'byord dubazhin no/ dang
bzhin te/ rab 'byar chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mgayo'o// chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'abyoradeci'i phyire zhan/ de na 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgrub/
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbazhin nyid dang/ mnor bde bzhin nga dang/ gzhan m yin pa bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid ngang/ chos kyi byings dang/ chos

kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyonamang pa nyidadang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pad nying na so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nying dang/ mnor bde bzhamanying dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyidadang/ chos

zla nying dang/ chos kyi dbyingasadang/ chos kyi gnas nyare dang/ chos skyonamad pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de nyid na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang/ mnobade bzhin nyid

dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyingesadang/ chos kyi gnas nying dang 3chos skor mad pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de nyid mchos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi

de bzhin nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyengadang/ chos nyidadang/ chos kyidabyings ngang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mathar 'o//

da nyingan brgyadapa rnams kyi de bzhin nying ngang/ mnorab de bzhane nyide dang/ gzhan m yonepade bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid ngang dachos kyang byang sadang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/
dbang dag pa'i mtha'a'o// de nyidan rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyade bachemanyid dang/ mnor bde bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa dbazhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyadebyings dang/ chos kyanas da
03 dang/ chos skyonamad pa re dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de nyi nalan cigaphyir 'ong ba rnams kyi bzhan nyidadang/ mnor bde bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhane nyide dang/ chos nyid dang//

chos kyidabyangs dang/ chos kyi gnas nyang dang/ chos skyonamang pa nying dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de nyang na phye ma 'ong ba rnams kyide bzhan nying dang/ mnorab de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin
pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyangs dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid ngang/ chos skyon mang pa nyinge dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de 'dre nareg bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhun nyide dang/
ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyingadang/ chos kyi dbyangs dang/ chos kyi gnas nyidang chos skyonamang pa nyid dang/ yang dag par mtha' 'o// nga nyingani
rang sangs rgyas rnams kyade bzhin nying ngang/ mnor bdebagan nyidang/ gzhan m yin pa de bzhanyid ngang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings ngang/ chos kyi gnas niyingadang/ chos skyon med pa
nying dang/ yang ngag pa'i mtha'a'o// de nyid na byang chub sapasadapa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyire bzhin med ngang/ mnor bde bzhin nying nga/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos d dang
chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gonas nyid dang/ chos skyonamang pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i matha' sto/ de dag thams cad nachos manyam pa nyid de las rnam pangam 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyire zhan
de dag chos nyid dang/ chos kyi de byings dang/ chos kyiTanas nyid dang/ chos ston mang panyid dang/ de banamanyid dang/ mnor bdabazhin nyid dang/ gzhan m yanepa de bzhin nying//
dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'an de nyid yin da/ de dag lasachos manyam pa nyareces bya bgazhan gang yang med do// dab khyong gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan rasagal te de ltar so so'i skye

wA bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de nying dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ panyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang b rnams kyi chos manyamapa nyid/ nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi
chos mnyam pa nying/ de nyeng durgyanadu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cige phyir 'ongaba rnams kyi chos manyam pater/ danyid phying ma'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid
de nyide dag bcom pa rnams kyi chos manyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dapa' sams bu' chen po rnams kyi chos manyam pa nyid/ da/
nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nying lags na/ bcom ldan 'dasamatshamanyid ma 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ gzugasadang/
'o tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shesapa dang/ mge dang/ rnab dang/ snadang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yod dang/ gzugs dang/ sgrungang/ dridang rongang regapang/
[o chos dang/migug rjem par shesapa dang/ mge gtedus da regapa dang/ mgag 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ rnaba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ rnaba' 'dus te reg pa dang/ rnaba' 'dus ti drag/
pa na gyis tshor bdang/ sna'arim par shasapa dang/ rna'akhe dus te reg pa dang/ snang 'dus te regapa'i rkyen gyis tshongab dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i dus
da rigapa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba dang/ lus kyi rnabapa drangashes pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa dang/ lus kya'adus te reg pa'i skyon gyisatshorab dang/ yod kyi rnam par shes pangang yarekyi 'dus da
drag pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba dang/ sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ mar khams dang/ rlung gi khamasadang/ nam mkha'i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dang
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bdang/ rtanatsange 'brelapar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtumyig dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad ngang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshadad pa
ngang gzugs med pa'i snyomasapar 'jug pa rnams dang/ stunang 'pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi parol tuphyin pa
dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi rol tuphyin pa dang/ thabs makhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
[rf]@#/ yashes kyi gdu phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcudang/ dranapa bar gazhagapa rnams dang yang dgupar 'ong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul rkungapa rnams dang/
dbangapo rnams dang// stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan

ma mad pa dang/ sonapamed pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong panyid dang/ stong pa nyang stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nying dang/ 'dus byas

kaM stong pa nyid dang/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thogam dngathamamad pa stong pa nyid dang/ ra bgadab stong nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad

stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngang/ mang ges ba stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong ba nyid dang/ ngob nyade stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ rnam par
zla thapa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ mngon bar shes pa lnga dang/ dang nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi slothams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
Da bcudang ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par gapa bzhi dang/ byams pachen po dang/ snying rje chen podang sangs rgyas kyis ma 'dresapabaco brgyad dang/ ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
03gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad nyudang/ 'dusabyas kyi khams dang/ 'dusam byas kyi khams// bcom ldan 'dasachos de dag nakun kyang gatsag ngang gcig tshumadabagatsag las gcig 'das pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das de tsa'i slongadulen/ nga na 'di ltar gzugasakyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/ tsho ba'achos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dushesakyichos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/

rnam par shes par chos nyid kyang gzhan to/ mig gatshes nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lcang chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyichos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyis

nyid kyang gazhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ro'i chos nyid kyang gazhan/ reg gi chos nyidekyang gazhan/ chos kyichos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshag garnyem par

shas pa'i chos dkyang gzhan/ rna ba'o rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gazhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnamapar shes pa'i ngos nyid kyang gnan/ lus kyi rnam pa shes pa'i chos nyid

kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gazhan/ mag gi 'dus te regapa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna bar la dus rag pa 'chos 'dekyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/

lci' 'dus da rigapa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gazhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi 'dusate rig pa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan
nabar 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatsho bachos tid kyang gzhan/ sna'adus te regapa skyen gyis tshor ba'achos dang gzhan/ lce'i dus daregapa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/

lus kyi 'dus ragapa'i rkyen gyis tsho bachos nyid kyang gzhan yod 'dus te reg pa skyon gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'a'omasakyi chos nyid kyang gazhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gan/ ma'i

zla khams chos nyid kyang gzhan rlungag khamasakyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha' 'ams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes par de khams kyi chos nyid kyang gazhan/ ma rag par chos nying kyang gzhan/ 'du

byadakyichos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mnge dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug gachos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor 'chos nyid kyang/

gzhan srangapa' ris nyidakyang gzhan/ len pa'i chos nyidakyang gazhan/ sridi'i chos nyid kyang gazhan/ skya ba'achos nyid kyang gazhan/ rga lo'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gnan/ na

sdang gachos nyid kyang gzhan/ gtamug gichos nyid kyang gzhan/ ltaba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims la rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/

bzod par ngeb rol tu ni pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan ]bsam gtan gyi la rol tu nepa 'chos nyid kyang gzhan/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid

kyang gzhan/ nang stong panyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa nyadekyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyide stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang gzhan/ chen po steng pa de kyi ngos/

nying kyang gzhan/nadam pa stong pa nyidekyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dusabyas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gazhan/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mkha' las 'das pa stong pa nyidakyi chos

nyid kyang gzhan/ thog ma dang mtshad pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dor bamed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gazhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyide kyang gzhan/ chos thamasacad stong pa nyid

kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang gamtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyatshes 'ded kyang gzhan/ mdamages pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid kyi chos kyang gzhan/ dranab na bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyide kyang gazhan/ yang dag par song ba rnams kyi chos dekyang gzhan/ rdzu

'phrul kyang ba rnams kyi chos nyidakyang gzhan/ dbang bo rnams kyi chos nyid ngagazhan/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phagasapa'i baden ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad mad pa rnams kyi chos nyidekyang gzhan ( gzugasamad pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mgrwar gyis gnasapa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gnang

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma chod pa dang/ smon pa med par chos nyid kyang ganyan/ mngon pa shesapa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gtan/gzud+ma
kyi sgo rnams kyi ngos de kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang/
gzhan byams pachen po'achos nyid kyang gzhan/ snying rma nganapo'atshesakyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyitshesam 'dus pa rnams kyi chisang kyang gzhan/ sa rin po'i mtshan rnams kyi chesanyidakyang gnyan/
pa byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dusabyas kyi khamasakyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi bams chos nyid kyang gzhan lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltarngayan

zla nyings 'dra ba chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyang mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ chos rnam par dgong pangan ngo ltar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chan po ni shes rab ka pa re la dupanapa la spyod
pa'itshe/ gang la gnas shing chos rnams thadad du bgyid pa lags/ chos rnams thadad dum bgyis par na/ nga chub sems dga' samasangapa' chen pos kyang/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu ni pal spyod par mnusan/

ji ltar byang chub samasang ra sams dpa' chen posashesab kyi pe rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sanas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyonamadabang zhugs nas nyamadzes dang rang sangs rgyas kyi/

sa las 'dasataM/ mngon par shes pa yongasasu rdzogasaparab de pu lags/ ji ltar mngon paNashes pas rnam par rtse nang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs surdzogs par brgyab ngang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

byin pa yongs su rdzogasabar bgyi ba dang/ bzodapa' pa ros zhu na pa yongs su rdzogs par 'agyo bdang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs surdzogasapa bgyi ba dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha khol tu phyin pa yongs su

rdzogs par bgyi bdang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bang/ de dag rnam par rtsa bas sangs rgyas kyi zhingegasasangs rgyas kyi zhing du brlob gas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan dasa rnams l bstan
bkur brgyad palags/ de dag tu'ang dag par rtse ba skyed pa lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba das sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi nang yongs su 'dzin pa 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di skad du da stachos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa'i ng gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos manyam pa nyid/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang b rnams kyi tshesamanyam pa

de9 banyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ da nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan tsuge phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi ngos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir ma 'ong ba rnams kyichas mnyam ]
pa nyid de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos manyam pa nyid/ panyid ngang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyamapanying/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyitshesamanyam pa/

nying de nyid de bzhanegshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/ mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nying rdza ltar mtshan nyid gcage par 'gyur zhes

zerab ni/ rab 'byor de jaskamadu sems/ gzugs kyi chos de gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyidam yanam/ tshongaba'achos nying gang yin pa de nyed stongapa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du shesakyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong

ba pa/ngo ma pa nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pade nyid stong pa nyidam yananam/ rnam pa shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin// mig gachos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stongang nying ma

yin nam/rna ba'i chos nyid gang yine pad nyid stong pa nyingam nanam/sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lci'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yAn nam/ lus kyi chos rnying gang

yin pa de nyid stong panyade ma yin nam/ yid kyi chos nyingagang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugasachos nying gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sgra'achos nyide gang yanapa de 'de stong pa nyid

lamanam/ dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ro'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyidil yin nam/ reg gi chos de gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyingam yin nam/ chos kyi chos nyid gang

yaMpa dang stong ba nyid ma yin nam/ mag gi rnam pa shesapa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stongapa nyidam yan nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par chos nyid gang yin pade nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i rnam par/

shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa nga nyade stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nying gang yin pa de nying stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi rnam pardza shes pa'i tshes nyid gang yin pa'i 'de stong pa nyid la

yin nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba' 'dus te reg pa'i tshes nyid gang

yin pa de nyid stong pa nyidam yin nam/ sna' 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yanenam/ lus kyi 'dus te

rig pa'i chos dang gang yin pa de nyade stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus da reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyide ma yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'angos dgang yin pa de nyid

stong panyidam yin nam/ rnabu' 'dus rig pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa dem yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te gapa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang [“]nepa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

nam rtse'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong ba nyidi ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatshar ba'i chos de gang yin pa de nyang stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi
dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yanapang 'de stong pa nying ma yanam/ sa sems kyichos re gapa yanapa de nyid stong pa nyide ma yin nam/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang/

yin pa de nyid stong pa de ma mnam/ mar de khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa de ma yin nam/ rlungag khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nying ma nanam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi

chos nying gang yin pa de nyid stong pa de ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khems kyi rtsis nyingagang yin bde nyid stong pa nyide ma yarenam/ ma rige pa'i chos nying gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du

ba byang kyi chos nyid gang yin pa da nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa de ma yin nam/ ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyang gang yin pa de'ang stong pa de ma yin nam/

skye mched drug gi chos ng gang yin pa de nyang stong ping ma yin nam/ reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyingam yan nam/ tshor ba'i chos nying gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nying ma yin nam
srid pa'i chos gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyidam yin nam/ len pa'i chos de gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyeng ma yane nam/ srid pa chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nying ba yin nam/ rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong nyid ma yin nam/ spyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong panyidam yang nam/ tshul

khrims kyi la rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stongapa nyidam par nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyide ma yin m/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong ba nyi ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nying gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nying ma yin nam/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pad nyi

stong pa nying ma yanenam/ nang stong pa de kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi song pa kyi chos tade gang yin pa de nyid stong pad ma yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid

gang yonapad nying stong pa nyidam yin nam/ stong panyid stong panyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chen bo stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nying ma yin
nam donadab ba stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin m/ 'dus byas stong nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa'i nying stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dusamabyas stong pa nyid kyi

chos nyid gang yin pa ngo nyid stong ba nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyide stong pa nyide ma yin nam/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyidekyi chos nyid gang yin

bde nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dorab madapa stong pa nyid kyi chos nying gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyungam yananam/ rangabazhin stong panyid kyi chos nyinge gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyingam yin nam

[f ]nga@#// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin par ting stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nying kyi chos nying gang yin par nyang stongapa nyid ma yin nam/ mi dmigs/

pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang ya pa de nying stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nying gang yin pa de deng stong pa nyidam yanenam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidakyi chos nyid gang yin b de nyid

stongapa nying ma yin nam/ dngos po mad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid kyi ngosanyid gang yin pa de nyid stong ba nyid ma yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa de ma yin nam/

yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos de gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yonanam/ rdzu 'phrulargyudangapa rnams kyichos nyide gang yin pa nga nyade stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yon/

pad nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stobasa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa de ma yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pade nyid stong pa nyid ma yamanam/ 'phags pa'i

lam yan lagabargyad par chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong ba nyid ma yarinam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa

de nyid stong pa nyingam yin nam/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nag/ gzugasamadapa'isnyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna

par thar pa rnams kuchos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong ba nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/

mtshan ma med pangang/ smonapa med pa'i chos nyidagang yanepa de nyid stong pa[︽]nga ma yin nam/ mngon pa shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pade nyid stong pa de ma yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa de ma yin nam/ gzungs kyi snyan ms kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nying gang yanapa ded stong pa nyid ma
yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyichos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos de gang yin pa de nyid stong panyid ma yin nam/ sAng dzachan po'i chos

nyid gang yin pa deng stong pade ma yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos ring gang yin pa nyid stong pa nying ma yin nam/ rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'brasabu tshes nying gang yin pa de nyid stong pa/
nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar bsabu'achos de gang yin pa de tang stong panyung ma yin nam/ phyiram 'ongaba'i brasabu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong panyinge a nanam/ dgra bcom pa'i

kyi chos nying gang yin la de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyichos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyidam yan nam/ lam gyi rnamabangashesapang kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/
@# nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyichos nyid gang yin par de stong ba nying la yin na// rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam bde ma 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin namaM/ dag bcom pa chos nyid gang yin b de'ang stong ba nyidam yane nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin m/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nying gang yin pa de de stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nying ma yin nam/
zla gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasaden stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'on stong pa nyid la gakhrugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba mtshan nyide dam/ 'du shesakyi tshan

'di ya/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnamar/ra shes par mtshan nying ngam/ mig gi mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'achatshanatade dam/ sna'i mtshan nyide dam/ lce'i mtshan nyid dag/ lus kyi mtshan de dal/ ying

kyilatshan nyidadam/ gzugasakyaetshan nyidadam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid ngag/ sri'i 'tshan nyid dam/ ro'ilatshan nyid dam/ rig gi mtshan nyare dal/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan

nying ngam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes ba'i mtshan nying dam/ sna'am bangashes pa'i mtshan nying dam lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nying dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyide dal/ yid kyi rnamakhadzashes
lnga yapa 'dzanyidadam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nying dag/ rnapa 'dus te reg ba'i mtshan nyid ngam/ sna' 'dus te reg ba'i tshanying la/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ter dam/ lus kyi 'dus te/
rig pa'i mtshan rim/ yid kyi dus te regapa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen byas tshor ba'amtshan ng dam/ rnab 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba datsananying dag/ sna'i dus rdzog

ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'imtshan nyerangam/ lce'i 'dus te rngog pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba'ametshan nyide dam yod kyi dus de rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba'i mtshan nyid dam sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ma'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rlung gi khams kyi 'tshan nyid dam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/
rnam pa shesapa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ marage pa'i mtshan nying dag/ du byed kyatshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyings/ ming dang gzugasakyamtshan nyid dam/ sku mched drug gi
mtshan nyid dam/ reg par mtshan nyidam ]tshor ba'i mtshan nyidadam srang ba'amtshan nyid dam/ len par mtshan nyid dam/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skya ba'amtshan nyid ngas/ rga shi'i mtshan

nyang dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshanying dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tumun pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mtshan nying ngam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'tshananyid
dam bsam gtan gyi latshosatuphyin pa'i tshan nyid dam/ shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan dngam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bya stong nyid kyi mtshan nyid
ba ba stong pa nyid kyi tshan nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyisatshananyid ma/ chen po stong pa de mtshan nyid ma/ ngon dam pa sopa mtshan nyidadam/ 'dus bsastong pa nyid

rgyu kyi mtshan kong ngam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ thog ma nga nga tha ma med pa stong ba nang kyi mtshan re ngas/ dang bamad pa stong pa

zhing kyi mtshan re dam/ rang bzhazhi stong ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid ngal/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyide dum/ rang gamtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyisatshan nyid dam/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi/

mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po mar pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dal/ ngo bo nyid stong pa de kyi mtshan nyid dag/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo de stong patade kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhug rnams
kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spongab rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rdzu 'phrulagyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nying dum/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bya chub
kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyidadam/ 'phags pahAm yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'bags ba'ibadenapa rnams kyi mtshan nyingedum/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nying dam tshad mang pa
rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngom/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mthar gyis gnas par snyoms par 'jus pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid/
dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong panyadengs/ mtshan mchod pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam tange nge 'dzani rnams kyi mtshan nyid/
dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dban gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngag/ ma 'jiges pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
mtshan nyidam/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan ting ngam/ snying rjen po'i mtshan nying la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mtshed/
dam lan ci'i phying 'ong bar bras bu'i mtshan de ngam/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ranga' chud kyi5tshan nyid dam/ lamagyo rnam pa/

shes pa nyid kyi mtshamanyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nying dag/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyade dum/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan dadam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nying ngam/
dgra bcom pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas gyi mtshan nyid dus/ byang bsam sadab 'tshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshan de ngam/ chos kyi mtshan 'debudad par 'gyur ba
de ltabu'i chos gang yang dmages sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de na ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga lta bas na/

rnam grangs des 'di ltar dge par bya ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo yod/ so so'i skye bo lasagung na'ang dachad/ de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba mad/ dad pa'i rjes su/
zla 'brang ba las gung na'angang mad/ de la'ang chos kyi rjes su 'brangabamang chos kyi rjes su 'brang bawas chung na'angad mad/ de la'ang brgyad pa mad/brgyud pa las gang nu'angad mad/ de'ang rgyun
! zhugs pa med/ rgyunadu zhugs pa las chung na'ang de mad/ de la'ang lan cage byare 'ong bshad/ lanatsagayunge 'ong ba las gung na'ang de mad/ dela'ang phyir ma 'ong ba yod/ phyir ma 'ong ba
las gud na'angad mad/ de la'ang dgra bcom pa mad dgra bcom pa las gung nu'ang de mad/ de la'angarang sangs rgyas mad/ rang sangs rgyas las gungana'ang da mad/ de la'ang byang
nubasams pa' mad/ byang chub samasadapa' las gungana'ang ded/ de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mad/ de bzhinagshegs pa las gung na'ang de med par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ chos
nying de 'dusabagyis pa lags sam/ 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ni 'dus byas kyang m yane/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te/ 'dus byas las ]
gung na'ang bsam byas yages su'ang do// 'dus ma byas las gud na'ang 'dusabyas ngamigs su med do// rab 'byor de ltar 'dus byas kyi khamasagang yin pa dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang/
yin pa'i chos deganyis ka'angaldan ba'angam yin/ maldan pa'i ng ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du sad pa/ thogs pa mang ba/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid zad pa'o// deng

god pa'i ng de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gam mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa/ 'du shes thams

cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig la na/ dal gang stongapa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasanger ma lags so// sprul pa de la gang stong ba

nyid malags pa de lta bu 'adengos po gang yang ma mchis da/ stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang/ sbalapa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'i ng ma lags/ ma ldan pa'i ng ma lags to/ de gnyis ka'ang

stong panyid kyis stongan/de ci'i slad du 'di stong pa nyid do/ 'di ni sprul pa'ozhes bagyi ba rnam par bcib par mdzad/ de ci'isladadu chen/ den da lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang sprul pa gnyis ka'ang stong pa nying lamigs su

dam gang sprul pa dan steng ba'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ga la te 'jig rten bdachos sal ba lags kyang/ 'jig rten las 'das patshos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi deng/ yang dag/
ts+tsa bar song baba' deng/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhadang/ dbang po lnga dang/ sto ljadang/ byang chub kyi yan lagabadun dang/ 'bags pa'i m yan lag brgyad pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i slogs

pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi deng/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa dgu dang/ ting 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/
ngangazhan gshegs pa'i stobasabcudang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pachen po dang/ snying chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa bcobargya lnga ngangag
gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zagargyun du zhugs pa dang/ lanatsag phyir 'ongab dang/ phyir 'ongab dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs padagabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa

rgyas zhes gang zag rnam par dgong pa chos dedag kyang sprul palags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni u0f97lapa ste/ de la la lan nyen thos kyis sprul pa'o// la la ni rang

sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o// la la na byang chub sems dang sa sprul pa'o// la la nad 'ganagshegs pas sprul pa'o// la lan nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o// la lan las kyis sprul pa'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs desan/ chos/

thams cangani stsal pa'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gangasangs pa zhes bgyi brgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'brasabu 'am/ phying ma'ong ba'i 'bras bu ya/ dgu bcom pa nyid dam/ rang
sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bskyed pa la

bkag pa'i tshos gang gi'ang rung ste/ de thams cad ni sprulapa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gangam sprul pa'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa/ chos gang la skye ba'ang med 'gag
pa'i ng mad padan ma sbrul pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'dasapa sta/ chos nganam lapa'o// gsol pabcom ldan

'das kyis 'daskang du stong pa nyid las kyang ma g.yol/ gnyis su'ang mi dmigs te/ chos gang yang stong pa nyade ma yin pa de ltabu mad do zhes bka' stsal pa ltagan/ bcom ldan 'dres ma sam pa'i mya ngan las 'das

pa'i ng sprul par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kuka' stsalapa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhane taM/ rab 'byongs thams cang ni stong pa// de dag na nyen thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
mabyas byang chub sams dpa' samasadapa'i chen pos ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa
wA de gang yin pa de na bya ngan las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa gang zag gsang po nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su tshul bar bgyin/ ji ltar gdamasakang
rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ba ston ngangs po yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab khyod 'di la dngos po yod pa'i ng lupaNatse/

po mad pa'i ng mang/ ngob dekyang med/ gzhan gyi dngos po'ang mdanA/ de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidecesabya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pasko
